Prepare Roadmap. Get general knowledge about developing Pandora UI components
Table1.TaskDescription:
1.  Create standalone application using pandora generator and pandora shell
a. Application first goal: organize downloading lis package (possibly in csv) with browser and saving it to a temp location in file system
b. Preliminary tech. notes:
i. create Web Api proxy controllers that use the existing related WCF services (LIS Session Manager, LIS Transfer, LIS Update, LIS Info services)
ii. try to avoid modifying service contracts of the WCF services
iii. on client side, try using mxHttpService angular service to connect to server side, possibly web workers and FileApi to organize fetching and saving data to file system
2. New generic approaches in service layer for registering services - they are likely still in development.
a. If it still will be actual, possibly extend WCF surface with new endpoints for better communication with Web Api proxy layer
3. If successful with the app in point 1, implement posting the saved package to TransferService.
4. If successful with point 3, implement uploading unclassified fingerprints.
5. If successful with point 4, implement the existing business use-cases: i.e: get an update request from service store, download data from lis, upload unclassified fingerprints, upload package to service store
6. Incorporation into pandora service store: so far it's not clear how it will be done
7. Authentication issues: oAuth2 and respective angular services for authentication - pandora service store should provide a common approach for that

The steps must not necessarily executed in the same order they listed here.

Table1.TaskTitle: Prepare Roadmap. Get general knowledge about developing Pondora UI components

b. Preliminary tech. notes:
i. create Web Api proxy controllers that use the existing related WCF services (LIS Session Manager, LIS Transfer, LIS Update, LIS Info services)

a. If it still will be actual, possibly extend WCF surface with new endpoints for better communication with Web Api proxy layer
3. If successful with the app in point 1, implement posting the saved package to TransferService.
4. If successful with point 3, implement uploading unclassified fingerprints.
5. If successful with point 4, implement the existing business use-cases: i.e: get an update request from service store, download data from lis, upload unclassified fingerprints, upload package to service store
6. Incorporation into pandora service store: so far it's not clear how it will be done

Table1.TaskTitle: Don't create "Person" for LDAP system user accounts / adjust LDAP workflow
Table1.TaskDescription:
20160210 ETV: Implemented.

Tech. notes:
1 Implemented a generic mechanism of passing an IPackageItemFilter to PackageItemGenerator that is used by Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.AddConnectorPackageItem activity. The activity itself is extended with "Item Filter" property, of type IPackageItemFilter, that allows to pass in an instance of the filter to the PackageItemGenerator.
2 For the purpose of the current implementation, a concrete filter type (AccountFilter : IPackageItemFilter) is implemented. It acquires actual filter options as constructor parameters.
3 Updated the following workflows:
LDAP-Client workflow:
Path LDAP-Client (root):
- adjusted Get Configuration Data activity, of type Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.GetSingleRecordData:
-- Extended list of Keys for that the activity could load new settings from LDAP configuration (SkipIfNameStartsWith, NameStartsWith, SkipPersonsLDAPQuery and so on).
Path LDAP-Client >> Create Package >> Package Body >> Get Multiple Records Data >> Records body:
- added activities:
-- System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision
--- here we check if a SkipPersonsLDAPQuery is defined.  If no, we may stay with the list of accounts that were received before.
-- Get Accounts, of type Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.GetLdapEntriesActivity
--- If SkipPersonsLDAPQuery is defined, we need to perform an additional request to AD with adjusted filter to get the list of accounts limited by applying SkipPersonsLDAPQuery, for creating persons. If SkipPersonsLDAPQuery is not defined this step is skipped.
-- Save Persons, of type Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.AddConnectorPackageItem
--- At this step, we apply all other ExcludePersons options (all except for the LDAP Query) by passing an instance of AccountFilter type, thus limiting the list of accounts, and then prepare Person.xml based on that limited list. This approach of applying the extended filter in 2 steps should work because the filter options are combined using AND operator.
LDAP workflow:
Path LDAP >> Process active items >> Process Item:
- To Switch activity, added a new branch for the case item.Type == Person
- Moved "GDIE Person [Insert Only]" activity (Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.ExecuteGdieSequence) from "Account" branch to "Person" branch
-- Please note that "GDIE Person [Update Only]" stays under "Account" branch.

QA:
Please test each filter option separately.
Please make some tests with composite filters.
- Pay attention to the situation when the composite filter includes new (on Extended Page) LDAP Query.
- Pay attention to even more complicated situation when a basic LDAP Query is defined for that configuration (on Settings page).
-- Example of LDAP Query: (&(givenName=inst*)(sn=adm*)) - it means: pick all account with first name starting with "inst" AND last name starting with "adm".
Please test syncronization of updated accounts. A possible problem here may be in "GDIE Person [Update Only]" GDIE sequence expecting that all persons it wants to update already exist in DB but they don't because they were skipped from creation before. Just need to check this situation.
Please test whatever situation you may think is relevant here with LDAP data provider.
Latest check-in on this task: 20160210 12:59 PM

[Dev]: Workflow Activities for VMware VM Management - Create Snapshot - Develop
Table1.TaskDescription:
Description of parameters of the activity:

 

1)  Id of a virtual machine

 

2)  Name of a snapshot - Specify a name for the new snapshot.

 

3) Description of a snapshot  - Provide a description of the new snapshot.

 

4) Memory state is preserved - If the value is 1 and if the virtual machine is powered on, the virtual         machine's memory state is preserved with the snapshot.

 

5) Quiesce - If the value is 1 and the virtual machine is powered on, VMware Tools are used to quiesce the file system of the virtual machine. This assures that a disk snapshot represents a consistent state of the guest file systems. If the virutal machine is powered off or VMware Tools are not available, the Quiesce parameter is ignored.

LIS Online Update - Add Options to Control Sending Classified Data
Table1.TaskDescription:
20160428 ETV Implemented

Implementation is applicable to both the old LIS Online Update wizard and new Lis Online Update data provider (exactly configuration used by that data provider).

Implementation details:
- added checkbox Send Classfied Data
- if the current customer is co-author (or partner) the following UI changes are applied:
-- Send Unclassified Fingerprints - disabled and unchecked
-- Send Unclassified Licenses - disabled and unchecked
-- Send Classfied Data - enabled and unchecked by default
-- Download user data for upload link - hidden (since uploading unclassified data is not allowed for co-authors so far)
if the current customer is a regular (usual) customer
- everything is left intact (as it was)
- new checkbox "Send Classfied Data" is hidden

For QA:
- please check the behavior in accordance to the implementation details given above
- please check both new data provider (Settings page) and old LIS Online Update wizard

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T123746 - 8.0.1 SCCM Inventory imports strange domain values for the most Computers
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Schenten, Kevin
Found in build: 8.0.1.1496 - WPM2015 Update 1

2016-04-29 KSN:

Lets do the remote session, before customer escalates this issue.

******************

Importing Data from Customers SCCM cause strange behavior. The Clients in SCCM has the domain 'cznet' defined but the SCCM Import changes them by daily basis. There has to be any attribute in SCCM which is either null or empty, because the import matches them with any imported domain which has either an empty DomainName or an empty NT4Name. If there is no such domain, the import will create one with names neither us nor the customer can tell where it came from.
We already tryed fixing this by giving the Domains NT4Name and DomainName and setting it to IsIntern = 1 but after a new import, the above explained behavior occurs again. At the moment I have no clue what to do next.
I already had Serhiy Yatsyuk involved and we checked the Staging DB of the old SCCM Connector which lead us to the things I said above.

[04.03.2016 10:24:57] Kevin Schenten: May I ask a question about the old sccm Import of 8.0.1?
[04.03.2016 10:26:20] Kevin Schenten: We have a customer where 1500 Computers have a strange value in the Domain Attribute and we have no clue why and where this value Comes from. So our plan at the Moment is to have a look in the staging table
[04.03.2016 10:28:47] Serhiy Yatsyuk: hi, let's take a look. what are these strange values?
[04.03.2016 10:41:42] Kevin Schenten: a Domain Name that nobody has a clue about. it's 'GLT'
[04.03.2016 10:41:55] Kevin Schenten: so, should I start a session and you join?
[04.03.2016 10:46:27] Serhiy Yatsyuk: well, why not
[04.03.2016 10:47:39] Serhiy Yatsyuk: but I have 1/2 hour only to devote to it
[04.03.2016 10:47:45] Kevin Schenten: no problem
[04.03.2016 10:47:57] Kevin Schenten: I'll start the session and give you the id
[04.03.2016 10:48:02] Serhiy Yatsyuk: great
[04.03.2016 10:49:01] Kevin Schenten: 474133
[04.03.2016 10:49:38] Serhiy Yatsyuk: FastClient?
[04.03.2016 10:49:46] Kevin Schenten: join,fastviewer.com
[04.03.2016 10:49:51] Kevin Schenten: join.fastviewer.com
[04.03.2016 10:50:26] Kevin Schenten: ok, you can control
[04.03.2016 10:54:28] Kevin Schenten: deaal10x000x is the hostname of one of the clients
[04.03.2016 10:54:39] Serhiy Yatsyuk: thanks
[04.03.2016 10:55:41] Kevin Schenten: Oo
[04.03.2016 10:55:46] Serhiy Yatsyuk: :)
[04.03.2016 10:56:23] Kevin Schenten: zo05j0000h is an other one
[04.03.2016 10:56:28] Serhiy Yatsyuk: mom
[04.03.2016 10:56:51] Serhiy Yatsyuk: much better
[04.03.2016 10:57:08] Kevin Schenten: we might check if there are multiple sites in sccm configured and the last one has overwritten the data
[04.03.2016 10:57:11] Kevin Schenten: ah k
[04.03.2016 10:58:58] Serhiy Yatsyuk: as I can see, Domain attribute is empty, but _SPSNetDomain is assigned. but I don't remember exactly what logic works in this case. let me take a look at the connector
[04.03.2016 10:59:20] Kevin Schenten: the connector in the customers System?
[04.03.2016 11:00:14] Serhiy Yatsyuk: no, my local one :)
[04.03.2016 11:00:22] Kevin Schenten: ok <:
[04.03.2016 11:03:44] Serhiy Yatsyuk: M42InstanceStore is working database?
[04.03.2016 11:04:12] Kevin Schenten: what do you mean by 'working database'
[04.03.2016 11:04:29] Serhiy Yatsyuk: I mean main database of the service store :)
[04.03.2016 11:04:43] Kevin Schenten: M42Production or M42Store
[04.03.2016 11:05:12] Kevin Schenten: mom
[04.03.2016 11:05:31] Kevin Schenten: pls scroll down a bit
[04.03.2016 11:05:49] Kevin Schenten: U4Usuite
[04.03.2016 11:05:55] Serhiy Yatsyuk: aha, thanks
[04.03.2016 11:06:50] Serhiy Yatsyuk: is it? :)
[04.03.2016 11:07:25] Kevin Schenten: is it what? :D
[04.03.2016 11:07:58] Kevin Schenten: thats the Domain, yes
[04.03.2016 11:08:05] Serhiy Yatsyuk: strange domain name ;)
[04.03.2016 11:08:10] Serhiy Yatsyuk: "GLT"
[04.03.2016 11:08:21] Kevin Schenten: yeah ofc
[04.03.2016 11:08:33] Serhiy Yatsyuk: perhaps following thing happens
[04.03.2016 11:09:00] Serhiy Yatsyuk: SCCM connector imports computer records with empty domain names
[04.03.2016 11:09:47] Serhiy Yatsyuk: also, you have a domain in the service store with empty NT4Name attribute
[04.03.2016 11:10:09] Serhiy Yatsyuk: based on logic of SCCM connector, they match
[04.03.2016 11:10:21] Kevin Schenten: ahh, I see
[04.03.2016 11:10:45] Serhiy Yatsyuk: because the connector compares records by domain name or NT4 name
[04.03.2016 11:11:12] Serhiy Yatsyuk: I would advise to change NT4Name of existing domain to "GLT"
[04.03.2016 11:12:36] Serhiy Yatsyuk: also, I don't remember, how the connector proceeds with computers having empty domain name. anyway, if you encounter further problems, feel free to contact me
[04.03.2016 11:12:57] Kevin Schenten: ok, thank you so far
[04.03.2016 11:13:03] Serhiy Yatsyuk: you are welcome

Please let us have a remote session in the customers system to do further troubleshooting.

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T122676 - Unix Inventory fails
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

DMK 03.05.2016: Hi,

I'm sorry, but your answer does not helped me. To me, it looks like the problem takes place during ssh key exchange (in order to establish a ssh connection). Is it possible to arrange a remote session with your Linux expert?

regards

Daniel

 

Hi,

unix inventory failes and the following error message appears in logs:

2016-02-10T15:05:01.601798+01:00 pcb01389-vm30 sshd[5188]: debug1: kex: client->server aes256-ctr hmac-md5 none [preauth]
2016-02-10T15:05:01.602058+01:00 pcb01389-vm30 sshd[5188]: debug1: kex: server->client aes256-ctr hmac-md5 none [preauth]
2016-02-10T15:05:01.602342+01:00 pcb01389-vm30 sshd[5188]: debug1: SSH2_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_REQUEST received [preauth]
2016-02-10T15:05:01.602540+01:00 pcb01389-vm30 sshd[5188]: fatal: mm_answer_moduli: bad parameters: 1536 1536 1024

I have checked the sshd_conf, everything is configured in a proper way (No public key and no keyboard interactive authentication is used). Connection with other SSH clients works. The customer expressed the suspicion that our SSH Implementation don't support 2048 bit Diffie Hellman key exchange. I have checked which SSH Implementation we use (SSHNET) and I don't see a problem, as 2048 bit diffie hellman keys are supported through "diffie-hellman-group14-sha1". But honestly, I have no clued what else it could be, hope you can help me.

Thanks

Daniel

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T126204 - Service Catalog (V. 8.0.1) - Add to Cart blocks for > 5 sec
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Schenten, Kevin
Found in build: 8.0.1.1496 - WPM2015 Update 1

2016-04-21 KSN:

Customer has the following issue:

Dear Matrix team,

we are facing a strange behavior in our productive system. When a user opens the Service Catalog and clicks on the add to cart button (for any service) the systems seems to pause for more than 5 sec. See screenshot and log file of the network trace log of IE (log1.xml) which can be imported and viewed in Fiddler.

Only the following Ajax call seems to produce the problems:

URL Protocol Method Result Type Received Taken Initiator Wait‎‎ Start‎‎ Request‎‎ Response‎‎ Cache read‎‎ Gap‎‎
/SPS/ajax/update4u.Portal.UI.Pages.Catalog.AjaxCatalog,update4u.Portal.UI.ashx?_method=AddServicesToShoppingCart&_session=rw HTTP POST 200 text/html 0,68 KB 5.38 s  17441 15 0 5367 0 967


If this operation is repeated the same way (Add to Cart) it is fast again. See log2.xml

The same Ajax call as before:

URL Protocol Method Result Type Received Taken Initiator Wait‎‎ Start‎‎ Request‎‎ Response‎‎ Cache read‎‎ Gap‎‎
/SPS/ajax/update4u.Portal.UI.Pages.Catalog.AjaxCatalog,update4u.Portal.UI.ashx?_method=AddServicesToShoppingCart&_session=rw HTTP POST 200 text/html 0,68 KB 187 ms  1186 31 16 140 0 1014

After the browser window is closed and opened again the behavior is again slow for the first click.

Is there any initialization done at the first Ajax call on session level that might lead to this behavior?

Please help to speed up the system again.

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T125909 - Scripts for creating License Demand from AD group memberships are blocked
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

2016-05-04 OHR:

Hi,

a customer tries to create license demand from AD group memberships but calculation does not start and LCM datea processing runs into errors (see attached logs).

I ran some diagnostic scripts showing current blockings and what the SQL server is currently doing. It returned the results below, showing that one of the scripts had been running for over 11 minutes. Please assist. We need to get this fixed in the customer environment.

Kind regards,
Oliver

My used queries and the results see below:

-- shows blockings
SELECT
req.session_id,
req.blocking_session_id,
sqltext.TEXT,
req.status,
req.command,
req.cpu_time,
req.total_elapsed_time
FROM sys.dm_exec_requests req
CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(sql_handle) AS sqltext

****************

Result:

96 0 
               WITH ActiveADGroups (AD, ParentAD, IsActive, Chain, Cycled, [Level]) AS(
     SELECT AD, ParentAD, IsActive, Chain, Cycled, [Level] FROM
      (SELECT sg.ID as AD, rel.MembersGroup as ParentAD,
      CASE WHEN adcomm.State = 2080 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as IsActive
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), sg.ID) as Chain, 0 as Cycled, 1 as [Level]
      FROM SPSSecurityGroupClassAD sg
       INNER JOIN SpsCommonClassBase adcomm ON adcomm.[Expression-ObjectID] = sg.[Expression-ObjectID]
       LEFT JOIN [SchemaRelation-SPSSecurityGroupClassAD2SPSSecurityGroupClassAD] rel ON rel.MemberOf = sg.ID 
      WHERE rel.ID IS NULL 
      UNION
      SELECT 
       ad.ADGroup as AD, NULL as ParentAD,
       CASE WHEN adcomm.State = 2080 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as IsActive,
       CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), ad.ADGroup) as Chain, 0 as Cycled, 1 as [Level]
      FROM SPSSoftwareClassADGroup ad
      INNER JOIN SPSSecurityGroupClassAD sg ON ad.ADGroup = sg.ID
      INNER JOIN SpsCommonClassBase adcomm ON adcomm.[Expression-ObjectID] = sg.[Expression-ObjectID]
                 ) as rootAD
                
     UNION ALL
 
     SELECT rel.MemberOf, rel.MembersGroup, CASE WHEN active.IsActive = 1 AND comm.State = 2080 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as IsActive
     ,active.Chain + CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), MemberOf)
     ,CASE WHEN  active.Level > 1 AND CHARINDEX(CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), MemberOf), active.Chain) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, active.Level + 1
     FROM SPSSecurityGroupClassAD sg 
     INNER JOIN ActiveADGroups active ON sg.ID = active.AD
     INNER JOIN [SchemaRelation-SPSSecurityGroupClassAD2SPSSecurityGroupClassAD] rel ON active.AD = rel.MembersGroup 
     INNER JOIN SPSSecurityGroupClassAD sgAD ON rel.MemberOf = sgAD.ID
     INNER JOIN SpsCommonClassBase comm ON comm.[Expression-ObjectID] = sgAD.[Expression-ObjectID]
     WHERE active.Cycled = 0 AND NOT(active.Level > 1 AND CHARINDEX(CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), MemberOf), active.Chain) > 0)
    )              
       SELECT DISTINCT TOP(500)
                   
             sg.ID as SourceID,
             soft.ID as SoftwareID,
             soft.LicenseModel as LicenseModel,
             soft.[Language] as [Language],
             target.ID as TargetID, 
             comm.CostCenter as CostCenter,
             comm.Location as Location,
             comm.OU as OrgUnit
                FROM ActiveADGroups ADs
                INNER JOIN [SchemaRelation-SPSSecurityGroupClassAD2SPSAccountClassAD] sru ON sru.Members = ADs.AD
                INNER JOIN SPSSecurityGroupClassAD ad ON sru.Members = ad.ID
                INNER JOIN SPSSoftwareClassADGroup sg ON ADs.IsActive = 1 AND CHARINDEX(CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), sg.ADGroup), ADs.Chain) > 0
    INNER JOIN SPSSoftwareClassBase soft ON soft.[Expression-ObjectID] = sg.[Expression-ObjectID]

                INNER JOIN SpsCommonClassBase softCommon ON soft.[Expression-ObjectId] = softCommon.[Expression-ObjectId]
                INNER JOIN [Schema-SPSOrgUnitType-SPSCommonClassBase-OU] tenantPath ON tenantPath.IdBase = softCommon.Ou
 
                INNER JOIN LCMLicenseModelClassBase lm ON lm.ID = soft.LicenseModel
                INNER JOIN SPSAccountClassAD accountAD ON accountAD.ID = sru.MemberOf
                INNER JOIN SPSAccountClassBase account ON account.[Expression-ObjectID] = accountAD.[Expression-ObjectID]

SELECT ACB.[ObjectId] Comp_ID
      ,ACB.[Ud_SwitchPortDescription] SwitchPort_Desc
   ,CLCB.[Name] Loc_Name
,CLCB.[ObjectID] Loc_ID
FROM [M42STORE].[dbo].[SPSAssetClassBase] ACB
inner join [M42STORE].[dbo].[SPSCommonClassBase] CCOM on ACB.[Expression-ObjectID] = CCOM.[Expression-ObjectID]
inner join [M42STORE].[dbo].[SPSLocationClassBase] CLCB on CCOM.Location = CLCB.ID

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T124212 - #IFD01823 - Sync Account workflows getting started after unlock account and may fail in customer environment.
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hello,

please see attached screenshots:
The sync account on agent workflow sometimes fail after unlock account workflow was executed with this error:
23   Fault FaultPropagationRecord 09.05.2016 09:08:02  System.Exception: Cannot update LDAP Entry 'LDAP://sd05556/CN=M9410,OU=TEAG,OU=Accounts,DC=t,DC=thueringer-energie,DC=intern'. ---> System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.LdapTsProfileProcessor.SetParams(IDictionary`2 tsParams, Object userParams)
   at Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.LdapProcessor.SetEntryProperties(IDictionary`2 values, DirectoryEntry entry, Boolean removeOnPasswordChangeFailed)
   --- End of inner exception stack trace ---
   at Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.LdapProcessor.SetEntryProperties(IDictionary`2 values, DirectoryEntry entry, Boolean removeOnPasswordChangeFailed)
   at Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.LdapProcessor.SetEntryProperties(IDictionary`2 values, DirectoryEntry entry)
   at Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.LdapProcessor.UpdateObject(UpdateLdapEntryData data, Boolean failIfNotUpdated)
   at Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.UpdateLdapEntryActivity.ExecuteInternal(NativeActivityContext context, ILdapProcessor processor, LdapObjectType objectType, IDictionary`2 values)
   at Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.ModifyLdapEntryActivity.Execute(NativeActivityContext context)
   at System.Activities.NativeActivity.InternalExecute(ActivityInstance instance, ActivityExecutor executor, BookmarkManager bookmarkManager)
   at System.Activities.Runtime.ActivityExecutor.ExecuteActivityWorkItem.ExecuteBody(ActivityExecutor executor, BookmarkManager bookmarkManager, Location resultLocation)

Can you tell me what this error means. This error happens on the customer where we added new function via PRB28619, but was maybe also present before.

First:
Do we realy need this workflow execution?
THe sync existing account workflow getting triggerted, cause unlock account workflow changes locked field.

Second:
On customer environment they sometimes fail and sometimes not. If have no idea why, when i tested it on customer system, workflows finished successfully.
It seems that only a few instances fail, can you read something from these error message?
Without this info, we can not prove the customer that everything works as expected.

We even tested:
Unlock account with "change password after login"
waiting till unlock account workflow has finished.
 Login with user before sync existing account workflows getting executed

>

sync workflows finished with success...

Table1.TaskDescription:

Hello,

Hi Team,

A customer experiences the following issue:

Pasting Screenshots is not possible in Self Service Portal with Internet Explorer 11.
If customer creates a new incident in Self Service Portal and tries to paste a screenshot into the description field, it doesn't work. Nothin happens but Copy&Paste of text works properly.
Customer is able to paste Screenshots in incidents created in Console (SPS).

Customer has tested it with Windows7 machines with IE11 and Win10 + IE11. All of them are affected with this issue.

The Problem is that the customer wants to use IE11 not other browsers for the Self Service Portal.

We couldn't reproduce it on our test Systems.

Could You help us finding the root cause for this issue?

Thanks

Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 7.2.2.1382- WPM 2014 Service Pack 2 Patch 2

2015-06-05 OHR:

Hi,

a premium support customer has an issue with a data gateway:

Data Gateway installed on 2 servers.
One of them (itesx0026) ist is in a DMZ and not in the domain. ConnectionString in Matrix42.DataGateway.exe.config is "Basic-Authentication".
The second one (itsrv0007) is in the domain. ConnectionString in Matrix42.DataGateway.exe.config is Windows-Authentication. The user running the GW has been added to local Admin role.
Service Store Servername: swbsvw2k26

Both gateways can connect to Service Store server but it can then not identify the server running one of the gateways.
Im Server-Log steht:
2015-05-19 10:55:26,835 ERROR 365 ServiceLayer (null) (null) (null)  (null) 7.2.2.1382   - Error occurred while executing service operation!
System.Exception: Message Service could not be subscribe. Could not find host \ITESX0026.
   at Matrix42.DataProcessing.Core.Services.MessageService.ResolveAgentHost(String hostName)
   at Matrix42.DataProcessing.Core.Services.MessageService.Subscribe(String hostName)
   at SyncInvokeSubscribe(Object , Object[] , Object[] )
   at System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SyncMethodInvoker.Invoke(Object instance, Object[] inputs, Object[]& outputs)
   at System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperationRuntime.InvokeBegin(MessageRpc& rpc)
   at System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ImmutableDispatchRuntime.ProcessMessage5(MessageRpc& rpc)
   at System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ImmutableDispatchRuntime.ProcessMessage31(MessageRpc& rpc)
   at System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageRpc.Process(Boolean isOperationContextSet)
 
Maxim Minkov has started invenstigation on request of Viktor Schopf and never reported back. Please assist.
 
Kind regards,
Oliver
++++++++++++
2015-08-05 OHR:
 
Hi,
 I finally reached the customer and investigated what you suggested:
 
we need you to check following thing:
Go to administration -> Data gateways and send screenshot of items defined there.
Expectations is to see atleat 2 new itesm with name itesx0026 and itsrv0007. OK
 
Each of them must be linked to Computer item(in "Runs on" field) Check validity of these names. OK
 
Make sure its possible to resolve them to ip from machine where service store is installed. OK
   itesx0026: 172.30.128.26
   itsrv0007: 172.27.0.7
 
also try to perform iis reset(this will help in case Data Gateways itesm was created AFTER service of data gateway was started. Known isse for 7.2) -> happens every morning.
 
Also make sure that ssl certificates installed on both machines. OK
Easyest way to check it: From Machines where datagateway installed open in browser https://swbsvw2k26/sps. -> Published for https://swbsvw2k26.stadtwerke-bonn.ads/SPS/Workspaces/HomeWorkspace.aspx?ContentWorkspaceID=C2D7107F-E8 but works fine. No Certificate warning.
 
I also added the most recent log from one of the other gateways.
Still need assistance.
 
Kind regards,
Oliver
++++++++++++++
2015-08-31 OHR:
 
Hi Dmitriy,
 
last response was:
"Could not find host stadtwerke-bonn.ads\ITSRV0007.
This error is caused by incorrect FQDN on machine where Data Gateway is running.
Besides verification of correct FQDN config on DataGateway machine, you can find config file named: Matrix42.DataGateway.exe.XML and add there a following values

<!-- Allows to override Host name -->
    <!-- Empty values means local mode -->
    <add key="Service.ComputerName" value="ITSRV0007" />
    <add key="Service.DomainName" value="stadtwerke-bonn.ads" />

There is a chance that incorrect values was send.
Plz keep me in track of does this solution helped or not"
 
It did not. See attached config and GW log.
Kind regards,
Oliver
++++++++++
2015-10-22 OHR:
Hi again,
encryption works after installing Hotfix_7.2.2.1382_20150925 - PRB28040.
However:
The Data Gateway still shows the original error (Internal Server Error). If we switch to the service account, we get "Error loading Host configuration"
See attached files.
Kind regards,
Oliver
 
+++++++++++++
 
2015-10-29 OHR:
Hi Andriy,
 
I admit, this is quite confusing, so let me clarify:
  • wbsvw2k26 - Service Store App Server
  • itsrv0007 - Data Gateway Server in domain (GW works)
  • itsrv0008 - Other Data Gateway Server in domain, set up with Basic authentication (not working)
  • itesx0026 - In DMZ with Basic Authentication (not working)
On itsrv008 the config does not contain the entry for <add key="Service.ComputerName" value=""/> is empty, for itesx0026 it is filled. So I will let the customer complete this information on itsrv0008, just to be sure.
I attached both configs.
What we must mainly focus on here is, why basic authentication is not working.
Kind regards,
Oliver
+++++++++++++++
 
2015-12-03 OHR:
 
Hi Medzhit,
 
the customer still does not have this working.
 
Situation:
 
we have 2 gateway servers itesx0026 (in DMZ) and itsrv0007 (in domain).
 
itesx0026 is using a local account, Data GW runs but Windows inventory cannot cannot authenticate on the servers. This was tested with the Windows Inventory Data provider trying to inventorise the server the gateway is running on. The user account is Admin however. Result:

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T122720 - Pakete mit Abhängigkeiten können nicht importiert werden
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Gebert, Ralf
Found in build: unknow

Ich gehe davon aus, das ist works as designed, oder sollte das funktionieren?

Das Überführen von Paketen mit gepflegten Abhängigkeiten läuft beim Import auf einen Fehler obwohl die Abhängigkeiten auch in der neuen Umgebung existieren.

Aktueller Workaround:
1. alle Abhängigkeiten des Paketes entfernen
2. das Paket exportieren
3. alle Abhängigkeiten in der Quellumgebung wieder einpflegen
4. alle Abhängigkeiten in der Zielumgebung einpflegen
Das Einpflegen der Abhängigkeiten ist sehr umständlich, da es keine Suchfunktion gibt aber eine Ordnerstruktur die händisch "durchgeklickt" werden muss.

Kundensituation: Talanx


VSH: closed as ticket is closed, and not clear - in german

PRB28615: Engine "Attachment Cleaner" deletes too much: DATA LOSS
Table1.TaskDescription:
5/31/2016 ABR: journal contains broken image urls when user create task/change/problem from Incident.


=======================

VZA 2016-05-31: the problem is that not all files which are attached to an object are displayed as html content. But pictures inserted into html are stored in attachments as well and moreover for some tickets created from another tickets their attachments are copied together with rest information. And it is reason why we sometimes see duplicated files.

To resolve it we should separate files added as attachments and files added as html context



5/31/2016 ABR: File is inserted twice for ChangeRequest.

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
PRB28616 - UTC -3 and -4 Timezones having no effect on displayed time in console
 
Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Clear browser cache
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
 
5. Copy the files:

"<Installationfolder>\web\Utility\UserTimeZoneResolver.js"

into a separate backup directory
 
6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET

 
8. Check the functionality

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1637 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which is fixed:
1. PRB28741: Error message while importing from SCCM - DynamicIPEnable cannot be NULL

Installation:
=============

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET

3. Stop the Windows Services
 - "Matrix42 Engine Common"
 - "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
 - "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files
  "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.AssetManager.BizLogic.dll"
 into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET

8. Clear browser cache (temprorary internet files)

9. Start the Windows Services
 - "Matrix42 Engine Common"
 - "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
 - "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

10. Check the functionality

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1637 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which is fixed:
1. PRB28741: Error message while importing from SCCM - DynamicIPEnable cannot be NULL

Installation:
=============

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET

3. Stop the Windows Services
 - "Matrix42 Engine Common"
 - "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
 - "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files
  "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.AssetManager.BizLogic.dll"
 into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET

8. Clear browser cache (temprorary internet files)

9. Start the Windows Services
 - "Matrix42 Engine Common"
 - "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
 - "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

10. Check the functionality

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
- PRB28321: Not possible to remove License Custodian
- PRB28378: LIS online update fails caused by [ symbol
- PRB28334: LIS Update fails with a deadlock Process ID 250
- PRB28538: Change of License Model for existing License Requirement can cause UI freeze
- PRB28568: reenabling of option in "set license pool" dialog
- PRB28651: LIS update NULL reference while step 1/10
- PRB28707: Partial license transfer with previous license conversion splits base licenses incorrectly
- PRB28693: Demand count inconsistent after changing Software Product in license demand
 
Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

3. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

4. Copy the files:
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.WorkProcess.Core.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.BizLogic.Common.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.BizLogic.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.WorkProcess.Core.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.WebUI.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\Matrix42.WorkProcess.Core.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.BizLogic.Common.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\de\update4u.LicenseManager.WebUI.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\LicenseManager\Wizards\LeaseLicense\ActionPage.ascx"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\DlgControls\LicenseManager\SPSAssetTypeLicense\LicensePool.ascx"
  into a separate backup directory

5. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

6. Run "<InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28538PRB28568_hotfix.bat"

7. Perform an IISRESET
 
8. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

9. Check the functionality

Table1.WiTitle: [UT] Cover scenario of PRB28448 by unit test
Table1.WiDescription:
Task 55050:PRB28448: Partial use of action "Transfer License" with option "Keep Base License(s) Unchanged" does not function

Symptoms:
During a partial transfer of a license the option "Keep Base License(s) Unchanged" does not function. The transfered license gets the base license removed.

Impact:
Low

Prerequisites:

  • Create a full version license with e.g. 10 usage rights for a version-specific software product
  • Create an update license to the next higher version of the same software product and add the other one as base license

Reproduction:

  • Perform action "Transfer License" for the update license
  • Select a new ownership and click "Next"
  • Uncheck "Transfer license entirely", change quantity to e.g. 4, select option "Keep Base License(s) Unchanged" and complete the wizard.
  • Open the transfered license

Result:
Transfered license has no base license

Expected Result:
Transfered license keeps a portion of the original base license

Workaround:
Manual corrections possible.

Thank You in advance

Ready: [Hotfix]: Hotfix_8.0.2.1580_20160331 - PRB28658
Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 
PRB28030: Export of VCards matches business contact attributes with private attributes
PRB27935: Address Book configurable items are displayed without line breaks
PRB28135: Address Book creates line breaks wrapping words randomly
PRB28000: Display of currency USD and CAD in Portal causes confusion because both use the same "Dollar Sign"
PRB28210: Demand Detection not working with 8.0.2!
PRB28188: SCCM Provider created services: deinstallation and repairmode not available and can not be changed
PRB28230: Returning a service as cost center manager: Costcenter of costcenter manager will be taken
PRB28412: Pages in Portal are requested twice when using the menu (IE 11)
PRB28491: SCCM Provider may create permanent cpu usage on IIS M42Service pool, because of an loop when resuming the worklfow
PRB27954: On returning one service which is the dependency of another service(s) of one user, all services of all users in the same cost center are returned additionally
PRB28076: catalog with more than 250 items cannot be exported
PRB28443 - Service currency displays not properly in portal
PRB28408: Hostcommon runs on 100% cpu an remains in this state (IVAN)
PRB28174: Partial approval of different services with same service as dependency not possible
PRB27939: Service Details inside bundle should show information more specific to the currently used catalog
PRB28507: Missing Approval Date in bookings of Adjustment Orders causes report issues
PRB28221: Demand Detection of 'invisible' services
PRB28337: Instanz einer Buchung wird im Portal nicht angezeigt
PRB28598: Rebooking service in Portal by cost center responsible creates no approvals
PRB28485: Searching in Catalog (Portal) is defective - false results are displayed


PRB28121: Service cannot be ordered second time, once the provisioning has been canceled
PRB28296: Demand Detection does not allow other CI's than Account and Assets from spsassetclassbase
PRB28487: Demand Detection does not detect uninstallations, when consumers is using service more than once
PRB28590: Demand Detection does not work correctly when row from LCMDemandEntityClassBase is used in ASQL Target Statement

PRB28496 - Wrong pricing in Self Service Portal after checkout with bundle surcharge options
PRB28585: Console Assign Service > Technical target can not be selected, when recipient is not in audience of selected catalog
PRB28502: Additional Services for Installation, Repair and Uninstallation Charges cannot be used in conjunction with custom pricing

PRB28273: Displayed attributes in Address Book cannot be changed
PRB28452: "Import Inventory Data" cannot be deactivated in SCCM Data Provider

PRB28658: Compliance Rule "Inform Users when a Ticket is in Progress" doesn't work properly

[Ready] Test: PRB28701: Save Schema for journal.ascx and attachments.ascx in database again
Table1.TaskDescription:
#########
Created by: Bönick, Matthias
Category: 
Build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2
#########

Symptoms:

For same cases it is possible that the entrys for journal or attachment pages in table SPSContentClassObjectDialogTab getting the flag  IsGenerated = 1. With that on an update or system check > publish dialogs, the schema from database is written to ascx file. This schema is quite old and is not equal to the one provided by an update.

It is easy to solve for us, but as soon as the journal is not correct every activity can not be opened. This issue is everytime severty 1 for customers, who are using the service desk.

I don't know, what the customers are doing to set this flag to 1, but I'm pretty sure that some action in our GUI is the reason.

Before we start searching, it is may be easier to simply save the correct schema for journal and attachment ascx in database, like for every other dialog.

Prerequisites:

To see the problem simply execute the script:
(Please note, this script is only for reproduction, customer are somehow setting this flag unintentional over the UI)

update SPSContentClassObjectDialogTabset IsGenerated = 1where ContentUserControl like '%journal%' and IsGenerated = 0

Reproduction:

  1. execute script above
  2. perform update or run system check in configizward while "publish forms" is active.
  3. open incident dialog

Result:

journal.ascx size is 1kb. activity objects can not be opened

Expected Result:

2 options:
Find out in code, which action can trigger this flag

or

Simply store schema for journal and attachments ascx in database.

LIS Online Update - Run character code detection during import unclassified data on LIS server
Table1.TaskDescription:
ETV. Implemented on-the-fly character detection code. 

Tech. details. Unlike previous implementation as a standalone tool running on the schedule by a sql server job (for example), the current implementation enforces character detection when an unclassified fingerprint (and catalog item) is imported from a regular (not co-author) customer. 

For QA: 
Currently this use-case may not be tested (need to discuss) because we have no verification for a co-authoring certificate - in other words, each service store installation is considered to be a co-author.

Once the certification check is implemented, please use the following scenario: 
1) As a usual user (non-co-author), get some fingerprints - e.g. run windows inventory data provider. 
2) Set chinese (korean, japanese) names for the fingerprints - directly in db (table SPSApplicationClassBase). 
3) Upload the unclassified fingerprints to the test LIS server. 
4) Check on the test LIS Server, that the fingerprints are saved to db with character code defined (1042 - chinese, 1028 - korean, 10 - latin). 

DB on Test LIS server = u4u_Reference
Script
select top 5 ID, Vendor, Name, Version, FullName, CharacterCode from Fingerprints order by AddDate desc
Table1.WiTitle: LIS Online Update - Run character code detection during import unclassified data on LIS server

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T122978 - SCCM Data Provider stores LastScanDate in incorrect format
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

2016-05-25 OHR:

Hi,

in a customer environment Computers imported from SCCM display the values of LastScanDate incorrectly as MM.DD.yyyy instead of DD.MM.yyyy.

In the DB the attribute LastScanDate is stored in format yyyy-DD-MM hh:mm:ss.sss befüllt, instead of yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.sss.

I askd the customer to run the following query:

select c.Name, i.FirstScanDate, i.LastScanDate, i.LastImportDate from SPSInventoryClassBase i
join SPSComputerClassBase c on i.UsedInTypeSPSComputerType = c.UsedInTypeSPSComputerType
where i.LastScanDate is not null

A sample of the results see below, complete result see attachments):

Name                          First Scan Date                     Last Scan Date                            Last Import Date
B-ITBS-WS-01            NULL                                      2016-09-05 12:58:53.000            2016-05-24 22:00:00.897
Z-ITH-NB-02              NULL                                      2016-12-05 10:06:33.000            2016-05-24 22:00:00.897
Z-ITH-NB-03              2013-12-07 13:35:19.000      2015-02-12 13:02:35.000            2016-05-24 22:00:00.897

 

The XML files of the import contain the LastScanDate correctly in format DD.MM.yyyy hh:mm:ss. (see attachments).

Region settings on app server for German (Germany) and English (US) have been checked and the formats are correct.

Customer is escalated. Please assist.

Kind regards,
Oliver

++++++

Issue is fixed in 8.1 due to the change to ISO date formats.

Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hajzyk, Peter
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

2016-08-09 PHK:

Attached the results of SQL query from customer for further Analysis, see attached CSV file

2016-05-27 OHR:

Hi,

in a customer environment all the Microsoft products with version 2016 are missing, although the downloaded LIS da contains them.

The following query returned 62 results:

SELECT * FROM [M42Production].[dbo].[LISSoftwareProductClassBase] s
join SPSSupplierClassBase p on s.Publisher = p.ID
where [Version] ='2016' and p.ShortName like 'microsoft%'


The following query returned only 1 result - the same one as in the attached screenshot:

select * from SPSSoftwareClassBase s
join SPSSupplierClassBase m on s.Manufacturer = m.ID
where m.ShortName like 'Microsoft%' and s.[Version] like '%2016%'

Please assist.

Kind regards,
Oliver

++++++++++

2016-06-29 OHR:

Hi,

Inquiry was resolved without an answer. Further input required.

Thanks and kind regards,
Oliver

Installation:
=============

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

 - "matrix42 Engine CommonX86"

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
   e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files:
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.SPS.Engines.Workers.dll"

 "<Installationfolder>\bin\nl\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\pl\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\pt\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\Matrix42.Web.Api.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.SPS.Engines.Workers.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\de\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\es\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\fr\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\nl\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\pl\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\pt\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\Controls\History\HistoryTimeline.aspx"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\Controls\History\TransactionGrid.css"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\Controls\History\TransactionGrid.js"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\Controls\History\TransactionGridInternal.js"
   into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Clear ASP.NET cache.

8. Perform an IISRESET

9. Start the Windows Services
 - "matrix42 Engine Common"
 - "matrix42 Engine CommonX86"

10. Check the functionality

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580
and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which will be fixed:
PRB28133: Managing attachments in console is not possible when an apostrophe is contained in display name
PRB28303: History dialog in Version 8.0.2 is not displaying properly
PRB28478: New HISTORY dialog causes IE freezes in objects with many history entries
PRB28670: New History dialog creates an error if object has many history entries

Installation:
=============

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET

3. Stop the Windows Services
 - "matrix42 Engine Common"
 - "matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
 - "matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
   e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files:
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.SPS.Engines.Workers.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.SPS.History.Consolidator.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\de\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\es\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\fr\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\nl\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\pl\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\pt\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\Matrix42.Web.Api.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.SPS.Engines.Workers.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\de\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\es\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\fr\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\nl\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\pl\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\pt\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.resources.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\Controls\History\HistoryTimeline.aspx"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\Controls\History\TransactionGrid.css"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\Controls\History\TransactionGrid.js"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\Controls\History\TransactionGridInternal.js"
   into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Clear ASP.NET cache.

8. Perform an IISRESET

9. Start the Windows Services
 - "matrix42 Engine Common"
 - "matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
 - "matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

9. Clear browser cache.

10. Check the functionality

[Inquiry]: T122673 - Problems with Custom Section format in emails generated from Compliance Rules
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hajzyk, Peter
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

02.06.2016 - PHK: It's not possible to import the edited CoRus with ComplianceRuleResourcesUtility.exe.
Please provide a new solution or how to import the edited CuRus properly back to the System.

15.04.2016 - PHK: It's not possible to edit the HTML code of the email template - no HTML tab appears (only available with (internaldev certificate?)

Please provide anothe possibility to edit the HTML code.
Thanks

------------------

Hi Team.

In CoRus "Inform Responsibles when a new Ticket was created" creates double line breaks as in source email.

The "Custom Section" under description is the following (original):

--------
<xsl:variable name="html">
      <xsl:call-template name="StringReplace">
             <xsl:with-param name="text" select="/ROOT/InputObjects/SPSActivityClassBase/DescriptionHTML" />
                   <xsl:with-param name="replace" select="'/SPS/Forms/AttachmentHandler.ashx?'" />
                    <xsl:with-param name="by" select="concat(/ROOT/Parameters/ConsoleURL/text(), '/Forms/AttachmentHandler.ashx?')" />
       </xsl:call-template>
</xsl:variable>
<xsl:value-of select="$html" disable-output-escaping="yes"/>
--------

In the email created from CoRu "Confirm creation of a new Incident to User" the text format of Custom Section from source email is created correctly. without additional line breaks, see attachment "#INC00709 - Ihr Support Ticket wurde erfasst.msg"

In the email created from CoRu "Inform Responsibles when a new Ticket was created" the same Text is created with additional line breaks, see attachment "#INC00709 - Neues Support Ticket eingetroffen" although in der CoRu "Inform Responsibles when a new Ticket was created" the "Custom Section" under Description is the same as in CoRu "Confirm creation of a new Incident to User".

Affected customer uses MS Exchange for mailing.

Adding the following red marked entry to 'update4u.SPS.Utility.dll.config' in Folder "<Installation>\bin" didn't help here.

<htmlSanitizer>

  <whiteList>

   <tags>

    <add name="style"/>

    <add name="html"/>

 


Can You help me to find the problem here.

 

Thanks in advance

=============

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store

 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\Matrix42.Web.Api.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.SPS.Engines.Workers.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.dll"

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Clear ASP.NET cache.

8. Perform an IISRESET

9. Start the Windows Services

9. Clear browser cache.

10. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: LIS Online Update - Identify Cyrillic characters
Table1.TaskDescription:
Implemented for Russian range of Unicode: 0410-044F. 
(It means however that text in other cyrrilic languages - e.g. Bulgurian, Serbian - may incorrectly be identified as Russian).

https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0_%D0%B2_%D0%AE%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B5
Table1.WiTitle: LIS Online Update - Identify Cyrillic characters

Table1.TaskTitle: LIS Co-Authoring - Adjust "Customer" in LIS Tool
Table1.TaskDescription:
20160614 ETV Implemented. 

Details:

- Implemented display of CharacterCode in Customers grid (last column)
- Implemented editing of character codes on customer new/edit forms: it is possible to define character code (chines, korean etc.) as a comma-separated list. If any character code is misspelled (and thus not found in db) - the appropriate maping will not be stored.
- Added characer code to Fingerprints grid (last column)
- Added characer code to Catalog Items grid (last column)
- Implemented mechanism that sets/clears CoAuthor flag for a customer if any character code is defined for him/all character codes are cleared. In other words, any existing mapping to a character code effectively means the current customer is a co-author.

- Please note: during implementation, the following views were updated on the Test LIS Server: CustomersExtended, CatalogItemExtended.

Table1.WiTitle: [Inquiry]: T128002 - SCCM SSPOrderForm

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
PRB28464: Virtual Compliance uses IP address as fallback for matching of consumers
PRB28131: VMWare Inventory doesn't import host hardware data, if custom computer CI is used
PRB28492: VMWare Inventory Provider dont work proper on multi-vSphere environments
PRB28606: VMWare Data Provider matches VMs by Name and Domain while taking this information from the DNS-Name
PRB28611: SPSComputerClassBase.DeviceID is used by VMware and SCCM Provider
PRB28644: Virtual Inventoryprovider doesnt set the state from a asset back to active
PRB28112: VMWare Dataprovider overwrites values for Main Memory with 0
PRB28786: Vmware Dataprovider parse incorrectly DNS Name from virtual machine

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
 
5. Copy the files:
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.DataProcessing.Core.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.VirtualCompliance.BizLogic.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.VirtualInventory.BizLogic.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.DataProcessing.Core.dll"

into a separate backup directory
 
6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Run database update
 "<Installationfolder>\Config\PRB28611_Hotfix.bat"

8. Perform an IISRESET

9. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

10. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Riegelhof, Tim

Hi,

the customer has the issue, that everytime when he try to open the Shopping cart in the Portal, he gets a .NET Error message.

We know this error message and it solve the issue when you delete the .NET Cache. But actual the customer execute a script which delete the .NET Cache several times a day.

The first run from the script is at 04:30. And now he must execute the script several times in a hour that the Shopping cart is available.
So deleting the Cache cannot be the solution anymore.

Any ideas?

Regards,

Tim

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T128514 - DEBEKA - Schwierigkeiten mit der Konfiguration des Unix Datenproviders für AIX-Maschinen
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hajzyk, Peter
Found in build: None

Hi Team,

Customer DEBEKA faces issues on configuring of UNIX dataprovider for their AIX machines.

Configuration on the Unix host:

- User (Tests has been made with ksh and sh):
  # grep matrix42scan /etc/passwd
  matrix42scan:!:205:1::/home/matrix42scan:/usr/bin/sh

- PasswordAuthentication has been activated in file /etc/ssh/sshd_config

- No additional packages has been installed, because the packages (dmidecode, lspci,...) are not for AIX.

Standard tools like grep, awk are available

- No additional sudoers are configured, because the mentioned programms affect only programms which are not for AIX (dmidecode, lspci,...).

If the scan is activated, we see the following entries in the log file on the UNIX host:

Jun 10 12:51:08 srdbvu032 auth|security:info sshd[14811246]: Accepted password for matrix42scan from XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX port 57327 ssh2
Jun 10 12:51:08 srdbvu032 auth|security:info sshd[14614578]: Received disconnect from XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX: 11: Connection terminated by the client.

In the GUI one can see the following, see attached screenshot "Unix_Matrix42.png"

According to the colleague he cannot see detailled information

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 
PRB28030: Export of VCards matches business contact attributes with private attributes
PRB27935: Address Book configurable items are displayed without line breaks
PRB28135: Address Book creates line breaks wrapping words randomly
PRB28000: Display of currency USD and CAD in Portal causes confusion because both use the same "Dollar Sign"
PRB28210: Demand Detection not working with 8.0.2!
PRB28188: SCCM Provider created services: deinstallation and repairmode not available and can not be changed
PRB28230: Returning a service as cost center manager: Costcenter of costcenter manager will be taken
PRB28412: Pages in Portal are requested twice when using the menu (IE 11)
PRB28491: SCCM Provider may create permanent cpu usage on IIS M42Service pool, because of an loop when resuming the worklfow
PRB27954: On returning one service which is the dependency of another service(s) of one user, all services of all users in the same cost center are returned additionally
PRB28076: catalog with more than 250 items cannot be exported
PRB28443 - Service currency displays not properly in portal
PRB28408: Hostcommon runs on 100% cpu an remains in this state (IVAN)
PRB28174: Partial approval of different services with same service as dependency not possible
PRB27939: Service Details inside bundle should show information more specific to the currently used catalog
PRB28507: Missing Approval Date in bookings of Adjustment Orders causes report issues
PRB28221: Demand Detection of 'invisible' services
PRB28337: Instanz einer Buchung wird im Portal nicht angezeigt
PRB28598: Rebooking service in Portal by cost center responsible creates no approvals
PRB28485: Searching in Catalog (Portal) is defective - false results are displayed


PRB28121: Service cannot be ordered second time, once the provisioning has been canceled
PRB28296: Demand Detection does not allow other CI's than Account and Assets from spsassetclassbase
PRB28487: Demand Detection does not detect uninstallations, when consumers is using service more than once
PRB28590: Demand Detection does not work correctly when row from LCMDemandEntityClassBase is used in ASQL Target Statement

PRB28496 - Wrong pricing in Self Service Portal after checkout with bundle surcharge options
PRB28585: Console Assign Service > Technical target can not be selected, when recipient is not in audience of selected catalog
PRB28502: Additional Services for Installation, Repair and Uninstallation Charges cannot be used in conjunction with custom pricing

PRB28273: Displayed attributes in Address Book cannot be changed
PRB28452: "Import Inventory Data" cannot be deactivated in SCCM Data Provider
PRB28755: Softwareservices from EM won't be triggered for installation in EM server
PRB28745: Error message appears if applying automatic demand detection

2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28000_Hotfix.bat
   Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28188_Hotfix.bat
   Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28491_Hotfix.bat
   Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28496_Hotfix.bat

8. Launch Configuration Wizard. Change Configuraion -> Configure Analysis & Reporting Services -> Select Redeploy Reports only! -> Next.


9. Perform an IISRESET

11. Republish Workflow Repository

 
12. Check the functionality

Hi,

in a customer environment there is the following issue with Silverback Data Provider:

Scenario:

  1. User orders Silverback Enrollment Service
  2. Workflow gets stuck in step "Set User Identifier" (see attached screenshot)
  3. In Silverback no "Pending Enrollment" task is created

Additional information:

  • Users who already have an enrolled device are not affected by this issue
  • If a user enrolls directly through Silverback Portal, enrollment is successful

Please assist. For infrastrucural reasons I had no opportunity to test, if this is a bug or a customer-specific issue.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note: 

=============== 

This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.1.1496 and must not be used with other versions! 

Problems which are fixed: 

PRB28023 - comma's contained in default values will be taken as comma into IsNull Function from GDI when appserver language is german

PRB28338 - "Import Customizings" runs into timeout on big systems


After applying this hotfix, the first "Import Customizings" action containing a new CI will take again a long time. Following imports should then be fast.

This Hotfix is not compatible with product versions 8.1.0.1651 and below. If you plan to update to one of this versions after applying this HF,

you need to patch the setup routine of the product with another HF.

Please contact support before you execute an update to these versions, otherwise the update will fail!

Updates to higher versions are not affected, they will include the fix and Setup is not influenced by the Hotfix.


Installation: 

============= 

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account. 


2. Perform an IISRESET 


3. Stop the Windows Services 

- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 

- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 

- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler" 


4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store 

e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store" 


5. Copy the files: 

"\bin\update4u.SPS.DataLayer.dll"

"\bin\Matrix42.Setup.Database.dll"

"\bin\Matrix42.Maintenance.Modules.dll"

"\web\bin\update4u.SPS.DataLayer.dll"

"\web\bin\Matrix42.Setup.Database.dll"

"\web\bin\Matrix42.Maintenance.Modules.dll"

"\web\bin\update4u.SPS.WebUI.dll"

"\svc\bin\update4u.SPS.DataLayer.dll"

into a separate backup directory 


6. Copy the attached folders to "<InstallationFolder>"


7. Perform an IISRESET 


8. Start the Windows Services 

- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 

- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 

- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler" 


9. Check the functionality

Table1.WiTitle: Consolidation of Volume License Agreements - Rework of Licenses tab
Table1.WiDescription:
Rework Related Licenses tab so that only one grid with relation via SPSAssetClassLicense is kept.

Migration for earlier created agreements works as follows:
  • if license has relations to 2 agreements (purchase and maintenance), then we take only purchase (via SPSAssetClassLicense) relation
  • if license has relation to maintenance agreement (via SPSAssetClassLicenseMaintenance) only, then we create a relation to purchase (via SPSAssetClassLicense)

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note: 
=============== 
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1651 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 
PRB28338 - "Import Customizings" runs into timeout on big systems

After applying this hotfix, the first "Import Customizings" action containing a new CI will take again a long time. Following imports should then be fast.

If you plan to update to version 8.1.0.1652 from a previous product version with this Hotfix installed,
you need to patch the setup routine of the product with this version of the HF.
To patch the setup routine of the product you have to perform these steps:
Extract the files from the setup executable, you can do this with every normal packer that supports the zip format, the setup is a selfextracting zip file.
Apply the content of this HF to the unpacked folders.
To run the setup execute now the file Matrix42.Setup.exe from the ...\bin folder of the extracted files.

In case these instructions are unclear, please contact matrix42 support.
Do not overwrite the files from your production folder with any content from the extracted setup, this will be done automatically during setup execution!

Installation: 
============= 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account. 

2. Perform an IISRESET 

3. Stop the Windows Services 
- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler" 

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store 
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store" 

5. Copy the files: 
"\bin\update4u.SPS.DataLayer.dll"
"\bin\Matrix42.Setup.Database.dll"
"\bin\Matrix42.Maintenance.Modules.dll"
"\web\bin\update4u.SPS.DataLayer.dll"
"\web\bin\Matrix42.Setup.Database.dll"
"\web\bin\Matrix42.Maintenance.Modules.dll"
"\web\bin\update4u.SPS.WebUI.dll"
"\svc\bin\update4u.SPS.DataLayer.dll"
into a separate backup directory 

6. Copy the attached folders to "<InstallationFolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET 

8. Start the Windows Services 
- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler" 

9. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T127602 - reset PW / unlock account WF succeeded with errors
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Schenten, Kevin
Found in build: 8.1.0.1637- WPM 8.1

The Unlock Account / reset PW workflow throws the following exception, even if the customer uses a domain-admin account:

System.Exception: Cannot update LDAP Entry 'LDAP://ms000020.verlag.cornelsen.de/CN=hilbert.t,OU=Externe Dienstleister Ressort6,OU=Ressort6,OU=Cornelsen Schulverlage GmbH,DC=verlag,DC=cornelsen,DC=de'. ---> System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException: A constraint violation occurred.

The workflow is marked as successfull, but the changes (pw, ChangePasswordAtLogon, PasswordNeverExpires, ...) won't be applyed.

Unfortunately I can't recreate it in our test environment.

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 
PRB28030: Export of VCards matches business contact attributes with private attributes
PRB27935: Address Book configurable items are displayed without line breaks
PRB28135: Address Book creates line breaks wrapping words randomly
PRB28000: Display of currency USD and CAD in Portal causes confusion because both use the same "Dollar Sign"
PRB28210: Demand Detection not working with 8.0.2!
PRB28188: SCCM Provider created services: deinstallation and repairmode not available and can not be changed
PRB28230: Returning a service as cost center manager: Costcenter of costcenter manager will be taken
PRB28412: Pages in Portal are requested twice when using the menu (IE 11)
PRB28491: SCCM Provider may create permanent cpu usage on IIS M42Service pool, because of an loop when resuming the worklfow
PRB27954: On returning one service which is the dependency of another service(s) of one user, all services of all users in the same cost center are returned additionally
PRB28076: catalog with more than 250 items cannot be exported
PRB28443 - Service currency displays not properly in portal
PRB28408: Hostcommon runs on 100% cpu an remains in this state (IVAN)
PRB28174: Partial approval of different services with same service as dependency not possible
PRB27939: Service Details inside bundle should show information more specific to the currently used catalog
PRB28507: Missing Approval Date in bookings of Adjustment Orders causes report issues
PRB28221: Demand Detection of 'invisible' services
PRB28337: Instanz einer Buchung wird im Portal nicht angezeigt
PRB28598: Rebooking service in Portal by cost center responsible creates no approvals
PRB28485: Searching in Catalog (Portal) is defective - false results are displayed


PRB28121: Service cannot be ordered second time, once the provisioning has been canceled
PRB28296: Demand Detection does not allow other CI's than Account and Assets from spsassetclassbase
PRB28487: Demand Detection does not detect uninstallations, when consumers is using service more than once
PRB28590: Demand Detection does not work correctly when row from LCMDemandEntityClassBase is used in ASQL Target Statement

PRB28496 - Wrong pricing in Self Service Portal after checkout with bundle surcharge options
PRB28585: Console Assign Service > Technical target can not be selected, when recipient is not in audience of selected catalog
PRB28502: Additional Services for Installation, Repair and Uninstallation Charges cannot be used in conjunction with custom pricing

PRB28273: Displayed attributes in Address Book cannot be changed
PRB28452: "Import Inventory Data" cannot be deactivated in SCCM Data Provider
PRB28755: Softwareservices from EM won't be triggered for installation in EM server
PRB28745: Error message appears if applying automatic demand detection

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
 
5. Copy the files:

"<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.Portal.Common.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.Portal.Common.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\update4u.Portal.Common.dll"

"<Installationfolder>\Data\ExcelTemplates\ServiceCatalog\CatalogItemsExportTemplate.xlsx"

"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.ServiceCatalog.Contracts.dll"

"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.EmSccm.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.EmSccm.Client.dll"

"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.Portal.UI.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\Matrix42.ServiceCatalog.Contracts.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.Portal.BizLayer.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.Portal.Client.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.Portal.WebUI.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.SPS.Contracts.dll"

"<Installationfolder>\web\App_Themes\Default\CSS\Default.css"

"<Installationfolder>\web\DlgControls\SPSGlobalConfigurationType\Services.ascx"

"<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.EmSccm.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.EmSccm.Client.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"

"<Installationfolder>\web\Portal\Pages\Catalog\ServiceDetailsItems.js"

"<Installationfolder>\Reports\SSRS\EN\Service Catalog\Service Consumption.rdl"
"<Installationfolder>\Reports\SSRS\DE\Service Catalog\Servicenutzung.rdl"

into a separate backup directory
 
6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28000_Hotfix.bat
   Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28188_Hotfix.bat
   Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28491_Hotfix.bat
   Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28496_Hotfix.bat
   Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28452_Hotfix.bat

8. Launch Configuration Wizard. Change Configuraion -> Configure Analysis & Reporting Services -> Select Redeploy Reports only! -> Next.


9. Perform an IISRESET

10. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"

11. Republish Workflow Repository

 
12. Check the functionality

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1637 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
- PRB28758: SCCM Data Provider sometimes creates duplicates of computer records, inspite of complete information in XML files and unique machine IDs
- PRB28774: SCCM imports wrong number of CPU sockets
 
Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Disable SCCM Inventory Provider.

3. Open file "Get duplicates of computers managed by SCCM.sql" in MS SQl Server Management Studio and connect to the M42Database.
   Execute the script. You will get a list of computers imported twice or more times from SCCM ( having the same name ). You should remove these duplicates from M42 Application
   manually and leave one computer from each duplicates group only.

4. Open file "Remove fragment duplicates imported from SCCM.sql" in MS SQl Server Management Studio and connect to the M42Database.
   Execute the script.

5. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

6. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
   e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

7. Copy the files
  "<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.EmSccm.Client.dll"

  "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.EmSccm.Client.dll"

  "<Installationfolder>\ServiceRepository\BinaryComponents\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\ServiceRepository\BinaryComponents\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.Design.dll"
 
 into a separate backup directory

8. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

9. Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28758_PRB28774_Hotfix.bat


10. Perform an IISRESET
 
11. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

12. Enable SCCM Inventory Provider.

13. Check the functionality.

14. Activate SCCM Inventory Provider and Check GDIE logs after it is completed.

Oliver

Got the needed information from customer:

The same behaviour with CoRu set to original.
Use-case is: affected user klicks on button "remind approver" and send the reminder. No error appears, but the reminder is not sent.

- Approval responsible is a person not a role
- No delegation is defined for the approval person

I have attached current log files, see "Hotscommon.log" and "Console.log"

 

22.07.2016 PHK:

CoRu has been already reverted to original and with original CoRu it doesn't work too.
Because this ticket is opened for a very long time and customer wants to go live with this System end of July, I recommend a remote session to check and solve it quickly.

after updating to patch 2, only this compliance rule doesn't work anymore. The Update4u.sps.utility.dll is already replaced, the CoRu itself is in original state: Everything else works proper. Is there something like a "block" for a certain time span? I.e. that its not possible to trigger the rule if the order is just 2 days old.
