[Inquiry]: T125265 - SSPForm for SCCM and EM services
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Schenten, Kevin
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

This Inquiry is created based on TFS item 54281. Please Troubleshoot the both provisioning Workflows regarding the necessarynes of the SSPForm.

Conversation with DEV so far:

[24.06.2016 11:50:46] Kevin Schenten: hey
[24.06.2016 11:50:54] Kevin Schenten: one question about the sspfrom inq
[24.06.2016 11:51:03] Eugene Tveritinov: hi
[24.06.2016 11:51:38] Kevin Schenten: there is absolute no negative effect if a customer changes the sspfrom inside the wf?
[24.06.2016 11:51:55] Kevin Schenten: the provisioning of the Service won't be effected
[24.06.2016 11:52:52] Eugene Tveritinov: i think it's just hides the form, but - OK -
let me ask the portal guys
[24.06.2016 11:53:03] Kevin Schenten: one more question Matthias just mentioned
[24.06.2016 11:53:48] Kevin Schenten: since you can't Change the provisioning wf for sccm Services and the sccm prov. workflow is a System workflow, no customer is able to Change the value
[24.06.2016 11:53:51] Kevin Schenten: correct?
[24.06.2016 11:54:56] Eugene Tveritinov: not sure but I admit this
[24.06.2016 11:55:36] Kevin Schenten: yep, just tried:
[24.06.2016 11:57:06] Eugene Tveritinov: when i played with it, I did not do a checkout for wf: just opened General page in Workflow Manager in service store, then opened configuration
[24.06.2016 11:57:17] Eugene Tveritinov: is it also forbidden for customers?
[24.06.2016 11:57:59] Eugene Tveritinov: if they cannot change wf configuration for sccm workflow (certificate unavailable or any other reasons) - then i guess there's no way to hide the SSP form
[24.06.2016 11:58:27] Eugene Tveritinov: i'll contact one more person here
[24.06.2016 12:07:22] Eugene Tveritinov: yes it potentially may affect provisioning process because the form gathers some data for the process
i cannot say for sure whether default values are provided for the process in case the SSP form is absent
[24.06.2016 12:08:32] Eugene Tveritinov: so it's logical - if you remove the form you have no way to specify data that may be required by the process
[24.06.2016 13:56:30] Kevin Schenten: I think, the data for the provisioning are gathern in the configuration form, not the sspfrom, right?
[24.06.2016 13:56:52] Kevin Schenten: there is a difference between EM and SCCM wf regarding the forms:
[24.06.2016 13:57:21] Kevin Schenten: em don't has a Default form, while sscm has
[24.06.2016 13:57:38] Kevin Schenten: I think this should be either both or None
[24.06.2016 13:57:59] Eugene Tveritinov: do you think it's a bug?
[24.06.2016 13:59:02] Kevin Schenten: no, not a bug. it's more like it should be same for both Workflows
[24.06.2016 13:59:10] Kevin Schenten: because they are quite equal
[24.06.2016 14:02:15] Eugene Tveritinov: i'm a little bit confused frankly speaking
[24.06.2016 14:02:33] Kevin Schenten: <:
[24.06.2016 14:04:59] Eugene Tveritinov: in my opinion if a ssp form was defined for sccm workflow it's likely done intentionally to provide some values used in provisioning process
[24.06.2016 14:05:36] Kevin Schenten: ok, than what is the configuration from for?
[24.06.2016 14:05:52] Kevin Schenten: in case of sccm it both the same in the workflow
[24.06.2016 14:06:33] Kevin Schenten: in case of em, which should be nearly the same, there is no sspfrom provided in the wf, which I think is strange
[24.06.2016 14:07:16] Kevin Schenten: because if SCCM Needs the Information from the sspfrom, EM should Need it as well because EM is just triggering sccm as well, is it?
[24.06.2016 14:07:53] Eugene Tveritinov: i need to talk to the guys who did it
[24.06.2016 14:08:08] Kevin Schenten: ok, maybe create a slack channel so we cann talk together
[24.06.2016 14:08:14] Eugene Tveritinov: i don't know what they wanted to dod
[24.06.2016 15:32:49] Eugene Tveritinov: Kevin, i've tested it a little: removed sspform from the sccm workflow, and passed an SCCM service through booking - provisioninng - acceptance process on portal
[24.06.2016 15:32:58] Eugene Tveritinov: at least no errors occurred
[24.06.2016 15:33:59] Eugene Tveritinov: more experienced guys though tell me that the form is necessary once it was added there, and the provisioning process could be adversely affected if the form is removed
[24.06.2016 15:34:36] Kevin Schenten: can you tell me who gave you that hint so I can ask one or two more questions?
[24.06.2016 15:34:52] Eugene Tveritinov: slava khilko
[24.06.2016 15:34:59] Kevin Schenten: ok, thank you <:
[24.06.2016 15:35:53] Eugene Tveritinov: and slava asked to tell to palamarchuk ^)
[24.06.2016 15:36:11] Eugene Tveritinov: vasily better knows about portal
[24.06.2016 15:36:33] Kevin Schenten: ok, than I'll ask vasyl

*****************************

[24.06.2016 15:41:48] Kevin Schenten: First of all, there is the Statement, that SSPForm 'might' be necessary, which seems to be unclear at the moment. Further, if it is necessary, I am wondering why the EM Workflow don't has a Default SSPForm as the following screenshot shows

Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Schenten, Kevin
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Customer "stadt bern" had a problem with his service layer. All workflows went in "faulted state" and didn't work anymore.
Just for information, customer got some hotfix regarding service layer for improvements on the performane of EM import and provisioning workflows.
Hotfix_8.0.2.1580_20160624 - PRB27[935,954,939] PRB28[030,135,000,210,188,230,412,491,076,443,408,174,507,221,337,598,121,296,487,590,496,585,502,485,273,452,755,745]
Hotfix_8.0.2.1580_20160404 - PRB28184

PLease see attached windows application log. The message is full of this message:

An error occurred while trying to start an app domain protocol listener channel.

Exception: System.ArgumentException

Message: An item with the same key has already been added.

StackTrace: at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.Insert(TKey key, TValue value, Boolean add)

at System.ServiceModel.Activation.HostedTransportConfigurationManager.EnsureInitialized()

at System.ServiceModel.Activation.HostedTransportConfigurationManager.InternalGetConfiguration(String scheme)

at System.ServiceModel.WasHosting.NamedPipeAppDomainProtocolHandler.OnStart()

at System.ServiceModel.WasHosting.BaseAppDomainProtocolHandler.StartListenerChannel(IListenerChannelCallback listenerChannelCallback)

at System.Web.Hosting.ListenerAdapterDispatchShim.StartListenerChannel(AppDomainProtocolHandler handler, IListenerChannelCallback listenerCallback)

at System.Web.Hosting.ProcessHost.StartAppDomainProtocolListenerChannel(String appId, String protocolId, IListenerChannelCallback listenerChannelCallback)

 

After restarting M42SVC AppPool this problem was gone, but we don't know when it will happen again.
I only found this regarding the error:
https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsserver/en-US/d2e96001-653d-4abf-a7f2-463e41d6ce2f/wcf-netpipe-activiation-error?forum=wcf

But the bindings on the server are standard like it looks on every fresh installed system.

Do you have any idea to this problem.

Please assist.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Table1.TaskDescription:
Hi,

its about Magna. I think its the best, if I just post the original problem description from Magna. I can't provide any further details, but if you have questions, ask me.

Original Message:

A while back you showed us a workaround to return services out of a Bundle/Group or set by logging in as the user and using the “Return” option. 

We tried to return a service for a specific user, which normally works, but not this time.

The reason is that the user already had this service assigned AND that this service was returned a few months ago. In the meantime the user ordered the service group (including this service) again.

As you see at the screenshot, the following error occurs when you want to return the newly assigned service.

 

As I see it there is no way removing this service except unassigning the whole Group. Or do you have another workaround for the workaround? ;-)

Thanks and best regards

-----------------------------

I was not able to reproduce the issue, so I think a remote session is needed.

Thanks,

Daniel

=============

- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28771_Hotfix.cmd

8. Perform an IISRESET

9. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

10. Clear IE cache

11. Check the functionality

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 7.2.2.1382 and must not be used with other versions!

Problems which will be fixed:
PRB27773: AjaxControlToolkit CombineScriptHandler sometimes cause errors
PRB27870: Opening any Property Dialog causes enormous operations in a background
PRB27561: In some constellations of a service bundle an included service may be listed twice in Service details overview in portal
PRB27639: Portal Catalog takes over 10 seconds to open when 1200 services and 800 bundles were created
PRB27630: Escalation Manager Bizlogic might cause deadlocks
PRB27304: Calculation of reaction and solutiontime from a SLA with minutes is incorrect
PRB27731: IE 8 Portal: Back Button does not work inside a bunde configuration when configuratio was opened over "configure" in our pop up
PRB27770: Contact Person will show owner instead of responsible
PRB27845: Automatic demand detection completely fails when detected user has no access to one of the related catalogs of the service
PRB27851: Portal fails for unkown reason, because currently active currency is detected as inactive
PRB27857: Performance critical Issue: Global Search in Portal is extremely slow
PRB27866: Enormous size of the Ticket close wizard page Response, ViewState size exceeds 500k
PRB27713: End of Life Asset Calculation is wrong when an purchase item is related to the asset
PRB27818: Adjustment Booking creation Querys should be optimized
PRB27903: When several users view their Workspace section in Portal, requests take up to 30 seconds
PRB27931: It is not possible to cancel an order which is already in provisioning
PRB27929:  Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.CloseChange Activity should be executed in business context

PRB27620: No Pictures in Mailbody

PRB27163: The content from mails will be displayed not always correclty in the ticket description
PRB28324: Missing functionality for the inheritance in the attachments control
PRB27904: Assign Service Wizard fails with a DBNull error by single services
PRB28076: catalog with more than 250 items cannot be exported
PRB28174: Partial approval of different services with same service as dependency not possible

Installation:

2. Perform an IISRESET

Problems which are fixed:

Investigation details: 

PRB28097 initially was about the toolbar in the attachment list being shifted below because of information bar control above. This problem (problem 1) was fixed, and the fix is present in both 8.0.2 and 8.1.0 release branches.
Additional problems (dropdown overlay and scroll problem) are not reproducible on our environments. Since the only customer who encountered that problem was able to fix it, and the fix is partially in the customer's customized code (that's not in our codebase), we cancelling the work unless the problem appears at someone else's environment. The probability of this is very low.

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions!

=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files:
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Inventory.BizLogic.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Inventory.Contracts.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.ServerCompliance.BizLogic.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Inventory.BizLogic.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Inventory.Contracts.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Matrix42.DataProvider.Contracts.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Matrix42.Inventory.Contracts.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Matrix42.DataProvider.AppicationInventory.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Matrix42.DataProvider.Contracts.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Matrix42.Inventory.Contracts.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Matrix42.VirtualInventory.DataProvider.HyperV.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Matrix42.VirtualInventory.DataProvider.VMWare.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Matrix42.VirtualInventory.DataProvider.XenServer.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Module\Matrix42.Inventory.Connection.ps1"
  into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET
 
8. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"


9. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T128984 - Missing mail attachments in emails processed by email robot
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 7.0.1.1242 - WPM2014 Patch 1

26.07.2016 MBK:
Screenshot added to show attachment difference in mail and service store incident please check Files with name "Antwort_ #T128984......gif"

20.07.2016 PHK:
I've attached the needed Screenshots and incidents as *.DAT file if needed. See attachment "Screenshots und dat der 4 Tickets.zip"

Hi Team,

customer Rhenus has the following issue:

On some emails if they are processed by email robot the attachments are missing. So email robot creates a incident with the Content of the email but the attachments which are attached to the source email are not attached to the incidents in the attchments tab.

The customer found the following Journal entry:

---

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<parameters xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <JournalEntryParameterBase xsi:type="JournalEntryResourceStringParameter" name="initiatorNotIdentifiedResource" resourceKey="InitiatorNotIdentified" fullTypeName="update4u.ServiceManager.BizLogic.EmailRobot.Robot, update4u.ServiceManager.BizLogic, Version=7.0.1.1242, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null">
    <IsPortalMode>false</IsPortalMode>
  </JournalEntryParameterBase>
  <JournalEntryParameterBase xsi:type="JournalEntryParameter" name="emailSubject" isCurrency="false">
    <IsPortalMode>false</IsPortalMode>
    <value xsi:type="xsd:string">Hier die Mails</value>
  </JournalEntryParameterBase>
  <JournalEntryParameterBase xsi:type="JournalEntryParameter" name="emailSender" isCurrency="false">
    <IsPortalMode>false</IsPortalMode>
    <value xsi:type="xsd:string">katharina.bischoff@daimler.com (katharina.bischoff@daimler.com)</value>
  </JournalEntryParameterBase>
  <JournalEntryParameterBase xsi:type="JournalEntryParameter" name="to" isCurrency="false">
    <IsPortalMode>false</IsPortalMode>
    <value xsi:type="xsd:string">controltower.daimler@de.rhenus.com (controltower.daimler@de.rhenus.com);</value>
  </JournalEntryParameterBase>
  <JournalEntryParameterBase xsi:type="JournalEntryParameter" name="cc" isCurrency="false">
    <IsPortalMode>false</IsPortalMode>
    <value xsi:type="xsd:string" />
  </JournalEntryParameterBase>
</parameters>
---

Find attached emails where the Problems exist as examples.

I've tried to reproduce it with the example emails but couldn't reproduce it in our test Environment.

Could You help us with it. Maybe a remote session on customer system?

Thanks in advance

Table1.TaskTitle: [CharSetDetection] CharacterCode define Korean symbols in Fingerprints not correctly
Table1.TaskDescription:
Character code is correctly detected as 10 (European languages) in when import is done to u4u_reference db, 
but in u4u_reference_online it appears incorrect: 

use u4u_reference
select FullName, CharacterCode from Fingerprints where ID = '7859B296-5B71-4910-949E-00058D63B097'
// 10

use u4u_reference_online
select FullName, CharacterCode from Fingerprints where ID = '7859B296-5B71-4910-949E-00058D63B097' 
// 1028

Possible reason is work of the buggy LIS_Server_Charset_Detection_Job. I've turned it off on LIS test server. 
Need to repeat the test. Replication itself (from u4u_reference to u4u_reference_online is unlikely to break the character code).

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
 
5. Copy the files:

2016-07-07- OHR:

Hi,

following issue was reported by JTN working for a new customer in Australia:

I have a Problem with the import from our LDAP-Connector, the Service-User what I use for the LDAP-Connector can't read every Account from the Active-Directory.

I know the Service-User has access to read the AD, but the Connector import only ~80 Accounts but the Customer has more than 300 User-Account.

If I try to read the AD with Powershell Get-ADuser …. I can see every Account but our LDAP-Connector can not read everthing.

We had the same Problem with the Installation-Wizard (see T128229) and I fixed this Problem with Domain-Admin-Rights to finish the installation, but DomAdmin-Rights for the Import is not allowed from the Customer!

I have everytime access to an VMWare-View-Client to work in this environment, can you or a other Developer  help me in this Problem?

I'm availible tomorrow Friday or next week on Monday or Tuesday

 

Customer: LSBC in Melbourne

Please assist. VSH annonced to assign a developer for the next sprint.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Table1.TaskTitle: dev PRB28820: Workflow version files don't get deleted, when undo workflow releases or deleting an workflow
Table1.TaskDescription:
2016-07-20 PBI: Problem will not be fixed. It works as designed. We cannot remove files or folders when user undo release or delete WF because it will restart Servicel Layer IIS pool (m42svc) and it can cause problems because system will be temporarily unavailable. Usually many WF versions are in test system but not in production. But you can avoid this problem manually in 2 ways:
1) Remove folder root\svc\WF and then run action 'Publish Repository'

2) Run configuration wizard and execute action 'Configure Service Layer'

Table1.WiDescription:
Problem will be fixed in 8.1.2

Workaround:
Use sql scripts from attachments to convert Service prices.
Script converts from Source Currency to Target Currency (defined in Global Settings->Currency->Default Currency)

For example if it necessary to convert prices from (SourceCurrency)EUR to USD(TargetCurrency set in Global Settings) using system currency exchange rates (Master Data ->Currency->Exchange Rates):
1. Use script ServicePricesFix.sql 
2.   Change values for variables to
    DECLARE @sourceCurrencyCode nvarchar(3) = 'EUR'          
    DECLARE @useCustomCurrencyExchangeRate bit = 0           
    DECLARE @customCurrencyExchangeRate decimal(18,4) = 1.11 
3. Run script

For example if it necessary to convert prices from (SourceCurrency)EUR to USD(TargetCurrency set in Global Settings)  using CUSTOM currency exchange rates equal to 1.11:
1. Use script ServicePricesFix.sql. 
2.   Change values for variables to
    DECLARE @sourceCurrencyCode nvarchar(3) = 'EUR'          
    DECLARE @useCustomCurrencyExchangeRate bit = 1                   !!!(change to '1')
    DECLARE @customCurrencyExchangeRate decimal(18,4) = 1.11   !!!(change to '1.11') 
3. Run script

PRB28744: 404 Error when adding location to object rights, where already many locations are configured
Table1.TaskDescription:
Problem is very likely in long url formed by RoleDimension.ascx control and passed to BrowseObj.aspx page. 
Was able to repro it by reducing URL limit on IIS to 100 bytes (4096 is the default).

Long url appears as result of dynamically formed browseWhere query string parameter. Fix was to pass this parameter via session only. Also added an ajax method to let the control update the parameter value in session as user adds/deletes locations. 

Fix also applicable to Locations, OrgUnit and Cost Center selections (3 instances of the same control) used on RoleGeneral.aspx page which is accessed by Set Permissions action. Widely used BrowseObj.aspx is not affected by the fix. It means that fortunately fix is local (RoleGeneral.aspx page only).

For QA:  
- please check adding locations when large number of locations is already selected (~50 locations)
-- you may also temporarily decrease URL limit on IIS to ~300 bytes (feature Request Filtering => Edit Feature settings => Maximum URL length (Bytes)).
- as regression, please check that already selected locations are excluded from the popup, and this list of excluded objects is correctly updated when user adds and removes objects

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1637 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which is fixed:
PRB28707: Partial license transfer with previous license conversion splits base licenses incorrectly
PRB28693: Demand count inconsistent after changing Software Product in license demand
PRB28760: Creation of license demand based on AD group memberships may sometimes fail due to SQL queries being blocked

Installation:
=============

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET

3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files 
  "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.BizLogic.dll" 
 into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET

8. Clear browser cache (temprorary internet files)

9. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

10. Check the functionality

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.1.1496 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
- PRB28492: VMWare Inventory Provider dont work proper on multi-vSphere environments
- PRB28606: VMWare Data Provider matches VMs by Name and Domain while taking this information from the DNS-Name
- PRB28754: Virtual Inventory Data Providers overwrite OS information even if the values are 0 or null
- PRB28827: Incorrect results after VMWare Inventory on standalone host - application logic does not allow identical entries in "VCenter" and "Host" relation

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
 
5. Copy the files:
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.DataProcessing.Core.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.VirtualInventory.BizLogic.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.DataProcessing.Core.dll"

into a separate backup directory
 
6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET

8. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

9. Check the functionality

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
PRB28464: Virtual Compliance uses IP address as fallback for matching of consumers
PRB28131: VMWare Inventory doesn't import host hardware data, if custom computer CI is used
PRB28492: VMWare Inventory Provider dont work proper on multi-vSphere environments
PRB28606: VMWare Data Provider matches VMs by Name and Domain while taking this information from the DNS-Name
PRB28611: SPSComputerClassBase.DeviceID is used by VMware and SCCM Provider
PRB28644: Virtual Inventoryprovider doesnt set the state from a asset back to active
PRB28112: VMWare Dataprovider overwrites values for Main Memory with 0
PRB28786: Vmware Dataprovider parse incorrectly DNS Name from virtual machine
PRB28827: Incorrect results after VMWare Inventory on standalone host - application logic does not allow identical entries in "VCenter" and "Host" relation

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
 
5. Copy the files:
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.DataProcessing.Core.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.VirtualCompliance.BizLogic.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.VirtualInventory.BizLogic.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.DataProcessing.Core.dll"

into a separate backup directory
 
6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Run database update 
"<Installationfolder>\Config\PRB28611_Hotfix.bat"

8. Perform an IISRESET

9. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

10. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T130043 - Workflows which were in status pending befor update (7.0.1) fail to continue after update to 8.0.2
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hajzyk, Peter
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hi Pavel,

as You wish here the inquiry for the Workflow resuming Problem for customer Rhenus.

Customer update from WSM 7.0.1 to 8.0.2 and Workflows which were in status pending befor update fail to continue after update to 8.0.2.
The first error message was "Cannot cast type "False" to String" and a modified DLL file (Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.dll) was changed on customer's system but than another error appeared -> "An error occurred while calling tracking participants causing the instance to be aborted.  See the inner exception for more details. InnerException Message: Index was outside the bounds of the array."

The following solution cannot be applied on customer's system because they need visual tracking:
removing <tracking> section in root\svc\Web.config file.

[Inquiry]: T128514 - DEBEKA - Schwierigkeiten mit der Konfiguration des Unix Datenproviders für AIX-Maschinen
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: None

Hi Team,

I create this inquiry because the native one has now the status closed and cannot be reopened.

Find attached the needed files for further Analysis.

Here the native Problem description and at the bottom the answer from Vyacheslav:

Customer DEBEKA faces issues on configuring of UNIX dataprovider for their AIX machines.

Configuration on the Unix host:

- User (Tests has been made with ksh and sh):
  # grep matrix42scan /etc/passwd
  matrix42scan:!:205:1::/home/matrix42scan:/usr/bin/sh

- PasswordAuthentication has been activated in file /etc/ssh/sshd_config

- No additional packages has been installed, because the packages (dmidecode, lspci,...) are not for AIX.

Standard tools like grep, awk are available

- No additional sudoers are configured, because the mentioned programms affect only programms which are not for AIX (dmidecode, lspci,...).

If the scan is activated, we see the following entries in the log file on the UNIX host:

Jun 10 12:51:08 srdbvu032 auth|security:info sshd[14811246]: Accepted password for matrix42scan from XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX port 57327 ssh2
Jun 10 12:51:08 srdbvu032 auth|security:info sshd[14614578]: Received disconnect from XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX: 11: Connection terminated by the client.

In the GUI one can see the following, see attached screenshot "Unix_Matrix42.png"

According to the colleague he cannot see detailled Information

-----

The old inquiry has been resolved with the following answer and cannot be reopened:

Hi Peter,

I need additional info here, pls. do following things on the customer env.:

1. go to "<Data Gateway installed folder>\Host\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Module" folder
2. make backup of Matrix42.Inventory.Unix.ps1
3. put attached Matrix42.Inventory.Unix.ps1 to the folder
4. run inventory -> Data Gateway should generate inventory file "<Data Gateway installed folder>\Host\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Module\empinv_snapshot.xml" 
5. provide "<Data Gateway installed folder>\Host\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Module\empinv_snapshot.xml"  & log-files from "<Data Gateway installed folder>\Host\logs" 

Best regards,
Vyacheslav!

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T130095 - Some monitors cannot be deleted
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

2016-07-14 OHR:

Hi,

a customer cannot delete a number of monitors imported by a GDI.

These monitors were imported via a user-defined GDI. The customer then realised that some information was missing, modified the GDI, ran it again and created duplicate records. Matching took place by InventoryNumber which was already present after the first run.

The monitors from the first import now cannot be deleted for unknown reasons. These records can be edited and saved, but any attempt to delete one or more of these records results in the following error:

Translation: Validation of action failed. One or more ubjects failed to meet the definition.


2016-07-14 09:13:13,802 WARN 76 Console (null) (null) (null)  (null) 8.0.2.1580   - update4u.SPS.BizLayer.Client.Tasks.Validators.TaskValidationException: Validierung der Aktion ist fehlgeschlagen. Ein oder mehrere Objekte genügen nicht der Definition.
Objekte sind möglicherweise geschützt.
   bei update4u.SPS.BizLayer.Client.Tasks.Validators.TaskGenericValidator.Validate(Task task)
   bei update4u.SPS.BizLayer.Client.Tasks.Validators.DeleteTaskGenericValidator.Validate(Task task)
   bei update4u.SPS.BizLayer.Client.Tasks.Logic.ExecuteManager.Execute(TaskInfo taskInfo, ITaskDataProvider dataProvider, Boolean confirm)
   bei update4u.SPS.BizLayer.Client.Tasks.TaskManager.Execute(TaskInfo taskInfo, ITaskDataProvider dataProvider, Boolean confirm)
   bei update4u.SPS.BizLayer.Client.Tasks.TaskManager.Execute(Guid taskID, ITaskDataProvider dataProvider, Boolean confirm)
   bei Matrix42.Web.UI.Controls.Tasks.TaskExecutionProvider.Execute()

The focus is not so much on finding out, why this has happened, but rather to get these records deleted. Please assist.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Create automated tests for RunWorkflow actity
Table1.WiTitle: Create automated tests for RunWorkflow actity
Table1.WiDescription:
This task is for OGN. This test must avoid problems like in related inquiry.

Create test with the following scenario:
1. Use old build to create WF. For example do it in 7.0.1.
2. This WF must use RunWorkflow actity and start child WF
3. Child WF must go to suspended state. For example use CreateTask and WaitForActivity.
4. Start main WF. Both WFs are suspended.
5. Update WPM to newer version.
6. Resume child WF. For example, close task created by child WF.

Expected result:
WFs resumed and completed successfully

Table1.TaskTitle: test [Ready] Description Text Area of Advanced Filter edit form is corrupted

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580
and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which will be fixed:
PRB28870: When an multi fragment import is executed as quick import, only 1 row will be imported
Please be aware that the "quick import" action not only doesn't work but also changed the GDI definition.
You have to reopen the definition of the GDI in the normal edit wizard and click the wizard pages
to the end to store the definition again. Only then will the "quick import" work in multirow mode.
Installation:
=============
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
2. Perform an IISRESET /STOP
3. Stop the Windows Services
    - "matrix42 Engine Common"
    - "matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
    - "matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
   e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
5. Copy the files:
    "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.SPS.GDIE.WebUI.dll"
    "<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.SPS.GDIE.WebUI.dll"
   into a separate backup directory
6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"
7. Perform an IISRESET /START
8. Start the Windows Services
    - "matrix42 Engine Common"
    - "matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
    - "matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
9. Check the functionality

dev [Hotfix]: Hotfix_8.0.2.1580_20160705 - PRB28168 (Rhenus)
Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed:
PRB28168 - Last Run Date and CurrentCycle in PLBEActivationClassSchedule are not updated since update to 8.0.2

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files:
"\bin\update4u.SPS.Engines.dll"
"\Web\bin\update4u.SPS.Engines.dll"
"\svc\bin\update4u.SPS.Engines.dll"
6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET

8. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

9. Clear IE cache

10. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T130486 - Performance issues with one LicenseManagement query
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

This topic is solved.

20.07.2016 PHK:
Hi Vyacheslav,
I asked customer and they use Virtual Compliance and need this engine activation enabled.

Hi Team,

our customer Rhenus has massive performance issues with one LicenseManagement SQL query (attached). If the system executes it (planned) than it generates SQL blocking.
If executed manually in SQL Management Studio it doesn't cause blockings.
Michael Ascher looked at that issue and gave me the information that somebody from LicenseManagement team should take a look at this query.

Find attached the SQL Query and the corresponding *.sqlplan file.

Thanks

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
PRB28030: Export of VCards matches business contact attributes with private attributes
PRB27935: Address Book configurable items are displayed without line breaks
PRB28135: Address Book creates line breaks wrapping words randomly
PRB28000: Display of currency USD and CAD in Portal causes confusion because both use the same "Dollar Sign"
PRB28210: Demand Detection not working with 8.0.2!
PRB28188: SCCM Provider created services: deinstallation and repairmode not available and can not be changed
PRB28230: Returning a service as cost center manager: Costcenter of costcenter manager will be taken
PRB28412: Pages in Portal are requested twice when using the menu (IE 11)
PRB28491: SCCM Provider may create permanent cpu usage on IIS M42Service pool, because of an loop when resuming the worklfow
PRB27954: On returning one service which is the dependency of another service(s) of one user, all services of all users in the same cost center are returned additionally
PRB28076: catalog with more than 250 items cannot be exported
PRB28443 - Service currency displays not properly in portal
PRB28408: Hostcommon runs on 100% cpu an remains in this state (IVAN)
PRB28174: Partial approval of different services with same service as dependency not possible
PRB27939: Service Details inside bundle should show information more specific to the currently used catalog
PRB28507: Missing Approval Date in bookings of Adjustment Orders causes report issues
PRB28221: Demand Detection of 'invisible' services
PRB28337: Instanz einer Buchung wird im Portal nicht angezeigt
PRB28598: Rebooking service in Portal by cost center responsible creates no approvals
PRB28485: Searching in Catalog (Portal) is defective - false results are displayed


PRB28121: Service cannot be ordered second time, once the provisioning has been canceled
PRB28296: Demand Detection does not allow other CI's than Account and Assets from spsassetclassbase
PRB28487: Demand Detection does not detect uninstallations, when consumers is using service more than once
PRB28590: Demand Detection does not work correctly when row from LCMDemandEntityClassBase is used in ASQL Target Statement

PRB28496 - Wrong pricing in Self Service Portal after checkout with bundle surcharge options
PRB28585: Console Assign Service > Technical target can not be selected, when recipient is not in audience of selected catalog
PRB28502: Additional Services for Installation, Repair and Uninstallation Charges cannot be used in conjunction with custom pricing

PRB28273: Displayed attributes in Address Book cannot be changed

PRB28133: Managing attachments in console is not possible when an apostrophe is contained in display name
PRB28303: History dialog in Version 8.0.2 is not displaying properly
PRB28478: New HISTORY dialog causes IE freezes in objects with many history entries
PRB28670: New History dialog creates an error if object has many history entries
PRB28735: ObjectContexts(0).dataform is not delivered, when action has no object context
PRB28519: Scripterror in BrowseObj.aspx with a Apostrophe in the GridLayout


PRB28071: Keywordsearch is still enable for users, who have already worked with the keywordsearch despite that the search is deactivate with HF from PRB27438

PRB28274: Deactivate the Autorefresh for all Users with central configuration

PRB27438 - If "Enable Keyword Search" is unchecked, keyword search is still selectable and can be used

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T130106 - Windows Inventory take to long
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Schenten, Kevin
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Windows Inventory is configured to Import inventory data of 650 Windows Server. It takes like 13 hours to Import the data with the provider.

In Agreement with Torsten Boch please analyse the behavior of the Long runtime. Logs are attached.


Comment from MBK: I talked with TBO. As first step, look at the datagateway logs.
Succesfully scanned servers may take 30-60 seconds till they are finished.
Server where the connection could not be established take more than one minute in the most cases.


We saw this times on many other customer systems. The core question from TBO is:
Can we improve these times significant?
Table1.WiTitle: [Inquiry]: T130106 - Windows Inventory take to long

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T130218 - Issues with synchronised ownership between accounts and persons
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hajzyk, Peter
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hi Team,

our customer Rhenus wants that the ownership of persons and account objects could be different on creating manually a new account and a corresponding person.
This is very important for customer because they need the different ownership between accounts and corresponding persons because of their internal cost calculation.
This was possible in Version 7 and in Version 8 the ownership of account and person is synchronised.

Customer uses WSM Version 8.0.2.1580

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T126681 - Workflows does not work after one day
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hello,

we have a strange problem with the workflow attached.
After one day the instances if this workflow simply fail with this error
""Exception calling "Authenticate" with "2" argument(s): "Authentication failed". There was an error with the OTAuthentication on Server: http://de-do-tecm04.uac.xorb.net:8080/otdsws"

This is the error which is defined in executed powershell: it seems that the workflows fails when the workflows should retrive a new token.
If you execute the script manualy with powershell ISE on the store server, it still works.
Only over workflow engine, it does not work anymore.
We also see no login attempts on the target server, when the workflow is executed.

There is kinda no documentation about this OpenText Directory services.
Our consultant didn't told me where he got this script from.
But he told me that the token should be released after 30 minutes.

Is there any known issue with workflow engine and "authentication tokens"?
I know this is a hard question :(

___________________________________________
Update 04082016
Hello Pavel,
thanks for your suggestions, to make your 4 poionts a but more visible I seperate the information with _____________.
I added an fiddler trace to attachments, see T126681.saz
________________________
We tried dispose with adding these 3 statements at the end of the script:
$OTAuthSVC.dispose()
$AuthSVC.dispose()
$DocManageSVC.dispose()

but it seems it didn't help. I wasn able to find the correct dispose syntaxt for
This part:

$OTAuthToken = $OTAuthSVC.Authenticate($credentials.UserName, $credentials.GetNetworkCredential().Password)

My example was this
https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsserver/en-US/65754a04-2dcc-4a55-a999-ad946dfda065/exception-in-powershell-method-invocation-failed-because-systemnethttpwebresponse-doesnt?forum=winserverpowershell
Any other idea?`

___________________________________________________
I removed error description from workflow and now have this error for you
Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.PowerShell.PowerShellExecutionException: System.Management.Automation.RuntimeException: Exception calling "Authenticate" with "2" argument(s): "Authentication failed" ---> System.Management.Automation.RuntimeException: Exception calling "Authenticate" with "2" argument(s): "Authentication failed"
   --- End of inner exception stack trace ---
   at System.Management.Automation.Internal.PipelineProcessor.SynchronousExecuteEnumerate(Object input, Hashtable errorResults, Boolean enumerate)
   at System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.LocalPipeline.InvokeHelper()
   at System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.LocalPipeline.InvokeThreadProc()
   at Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.PowerShell.ExecutePowerShell`1.EndExecute(AsyncCodeActivityContext context, IAsyncResult result)
   at System.Activities.AsyncCodeActivity.CompleteAsyncCodeActivityData.CompleteAsyncCodeActivityWorkItem.Execute(ActivityExecutor executor, BookmarkManager bookmarkManager)
________________________
IISreset helps to make the workflow running for one day.

________________________
08082016
We execute the workflow one time.
Wait a day and execute it again. Only after one day, we are getting this issue.
It seems to be not a problem in the amount of executions.

_________________________________
24082016
Thanks for your help. I Forwarded the analysis topic to our consulting. Your part is done for now.

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 
PRB28030: Export of VCards matches business contact attributes with private attributes
PRB27935: Address Book configurable items are displayed without line breaks
PRB28135: Address Book creates line breaks wrapping words randomly
PRB28000: Display of currency USD and CAD in Portal causes confusion because both use the same "Dollar Sign"
PRB28210: Demand Detection not working with 8.0.2!
PRB28188: SCCM Provider created services: deinstallation and repairmode not available and can not be changed
PRB28230: Returning a service as cost center manager: Costcenter of costcenter manager will be taken
PRB28412: Pages in Portal are requested twice when using the menu (IE 11)
PRB28491: SCCM Provider may create permanent cpu usage on IIS M42Service pool, because of an loop when resuming the worklfow
PRB27954: On returning one service which is the dependency of another service(s) of one user, all services of all users in the same cost center are returned additionally
PRB28076: catalog with more than 250 items cannot be exported
PRB28443 - Service currency displays not properly in portal
PRB28408: Hostcommon runs on 100% cpu an remains in this state (IVAN)
PRB28174: Partial approval of different services with same service as dependency not possible
PRB27939: Service Details inside bundle should show information more specific to the currently used catalog
PRB28507: Missing Approval Date in bookings of Adjustment Orders causes report issues
PRB28221: Demand Detection of 'invisible' services
PRB28337: Instanz einer Buchung wird im Portal nicht angezeigt
PRB28598: Rebooking service in Portal by cost center responsible creates no approvals
PRB28485: Searching in Catalog (Portal) is defective - false results are displayed

PRB28121: Service cannot be ordered second time, once the provisioning has been canceled
PRB28296: Demand Detection does not allow other CI's than Account and Assets from spsassetclassbase
PRB28487: Demand Detection does not detect uninstallations, when consumers is using service more than once
PRB28590: Demand Detection does not work correctly when row from LCMDemandEntityClassBase is used in ASQL Target Statement
PRB28496 - Wrong pricing in Self Service Portal after checkout with bundle surcharge options
PRB28585: Console Assign Service > Technical target can not be selected, when recipient is not in audience of selected catalog
PRB28502: Additional Services for Installation, Repair and Uninstallation Charges cannot be used in conjunction with custom pricing
PRB28273: Displayed attributes in Address Book cannot be changed
PRB28133: Managing attachments in console is not possible when an apostrophe is contained in display name
PRB28303: History dialog in Version 8.0.2 is not displaying properly
PRB28478: New HISTORY dialog causes IE freezes in objects with many history entries
PRB28670: New History dialog creates an error if object has many history entries
PRB28735: ObjectContexts(0).dataform is not delivered, when action has no object context
PRB28519: Scripterror in BrowseObj.aspx with a Apostrophe in the GridLayout

PRB28071: Keywordsearch is still enable for users, who have already worked with the keywordsearch despite that the search is deactivate with HF from PRB27438
PRB28274: Deactivate the Autorefresh for all Users with central configuration
PRB27438 - If "Enable Keyword Search" is unchecked, keyword search is still selectable and can be used
PRB28929: Issues with synchronised ownership between accounts and persons
Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
 
5. Copy the files:

"<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.Portal.UI.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.ServiceCatalog.Contracts.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.Portal.BizLayer.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.Portal.Client.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.SPS.Contracts.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.SPS.Utility.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"

Hi,

a customer has issues with running GDIE Imports from XLS and XLSX files.

After selecting the import source (XLS file) and clicking next, an error message appears. When an XLSX file is used, there is no error, but the dialog freezes and nothing happens. Error message see below.

I asked the customer to check if the GDIE activations run on the correct hosts (Common, CommonX86...), but they do.

Please assist.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Unknown error:
System.Data.OleDb.OleDbException (0x80004005): Unbekannter Fehler Server stack trace: bei System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionInternal..ctor(OleDbConnectionString constr, OleDbConnection connection) bei connectionFactory, TaskCompletionSource`1 retry, DbConnectionOptions userOptions) bei System.Data.ProviderBase.DbConnectionInternal.OpenConnection(DbConnection outerConnection, DbConnectionFactory connectionFactory) bei System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.Open() bei update4u.SPS.GDIE.DALogic.DataServices.BuildOleDBSchema(OleDbConnection conn) bei Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T128983 - #CIT03099 - Relation used in wizard leads to an error, when no dataform parameter is defined
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hello,

customer built his own wizard and has a problem.
http://helpfiles.matrix42-web.de/2015_EN/M42_WebDocu.htm#WM/CWM/SVS_ADM/Konfig/ADM_Create_Action.htm%3FTocPath%3DMatrix42%2520Workspace%2520Management%7CAdministration%7CConfiguring%2520Matrix42%2520Workspace%2520Management%7C_____7

The customer skipped create a workflow, because his action should only change the initiator if the current task or change.
Means he created a wizard page inside the Change CI, which only shows spsactivityclassbase.initiator.

He also skipped setting URL Parameters for the action.

As long as an relation is shown in wizard page an error occours, when executing action.
Please see attached screenshot:
Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection. Parameter name: index
System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection. [Inquiry]: T130705 - Airwatch Provider > Import devices GDI fails while filling staging with out of range exception
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

We have a problem with Airwatch provider on customer site.
The import devices import fails with this error:
System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Bei der Konvertierung eines nvarchar-Datentyps in einen datetime-Datentyp liegt der Wert außerhalb des gültigen Bereichs.
Die Anweisung wurde beendet.
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection, Action`1 wrapCloseInAction)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInternalConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection, Action`1 wrapCloseInAction)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser.ThrowExceptionAndWarning(TdsParserStateObject stateObj, Boolean callerHasConnectionLock, Boolean asyncClose)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser.TryRun(RunBehavior runBehavior, SqlCommand cmdHandler, SqlDataReader dataStream, BulkCopySimpleResultSet bulkCopyHandler, TdsParserStateObject stateObj, Boolean& dataReady)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.RunExecuteNonQueryTds(String methodName, Boolean async, Int32 timeout, Boolean asyncWrite)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.InternalExecuteNonQuery(TaskCompletionSource`1 completion, String methodName, Boolean sendToPipe, Int32 timeout, Boolean asyncWrite)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery()
   at update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Persistence.Connector.Sql.SqlConnectorBase.ExecuteNonQuery(IDbCommand dbCommand, String database)
   at update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Persistence.Connector.Sql.SqlConnectorBase.ExecuteNonQuery(String sqlCommandText, String database, SPSParameterCollection spsParameters)
   at update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Persistence.Connector.Sql.SqlConnectorBase.ExecuteNonQuery(String sqlCommandText, SPSParameterCollection spsParameters)
   at update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Persistence.Connector.Sql.SqlUpdateQueryConnector.update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Persistence.Connector.IUpdateQueryConnector.UpdateWithQuery(String targetTable, String targetDB, String targetDBSchema, String primaryKey, List`1 values, BaseExpression whereExpression, Int32 topClause)
   at update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Persistence.QueryCommandBuilder.ExecuteUpdateWithQuery(ObjectClass targetClass, ObjectAttribute[] attributes, List`1 columnTable, BaseExpression whereExpression, Int32 topClause)
   at update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Command.UpdateQueryCommand.ExecuteInternal()
   at update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Command.CommandBase.Execute()
   at update4u.SPS.GDIE.BizLogic.Staging.StagingHelper.ApplyTransforms(ISequenceDefinition definition, ImportRules importSettings, GDIEAsqlParameters parameters, ProgressInfo progress, IImportLogger dbLogger)
   at update4u.SPS.GDIE.BizLogic.SequenceSteps.Fill()
   at update4u.SPS.GDIE.BizLogic.SequenceSteps.ExecuteSteps(ImportStep stepFrom, ImportStep stepTo, GDIEAsqlParameters parameters)
ClientConnectionId:99074e3d-3182-41dc-9b7c-9e3abd2c5149
Error Number:242,State:3,Class:16

I had a look on it an realized that we do something different when processing these attributes in AW provider:
lastimportdate >spsinventoryclassbase
lastscandate > spsinventoryclassbase
lastseen > spsassetclassmobile

In Airwatch import definition we have a source column for lastseen as stringtype. (LastSeenStringDate)
this will be processed with tranforms with the mentioned attributes:
CASE LastSeenStringDate WHEN '0001-01-01T00:00:00' THEN NULL ELSE LastSeenStringDate END

I the transform fields and simply map lastseen with the attributes above.
import works fine now.

Question:
Bug in engine? >
transform is not able to convert  ISO Dates as string into date.
or
could this a customer related problem?

 

Attachments:
Screen from GDI
Mobiledevices.xml from customer.

This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions!

9. Open file <Installationfolder>\bin\SPS.config using a text editor, e.g. Notepad.exe, and insert following section:
===
    <!-- Customizations Import settings -->
    <Matrix42.Web.Import.Customizations
       disableSwitchingConstraints="true"
    />
===                           
10. Perform an IISRESET
11. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
12. Republish Workflow Repository
 
13. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: [dev]: [Connectors]: Documentation about ports used for communication by connectors and data providers
Table1.TaskDescription:
=====

AirWatch

=====

AirWatch connector uses HTTPS or HTTP connection, depending on location settings. In fact, it has been tested against HTTPS protocol only.

tcp 443 (https)

OR

tcp 80 (http)



=====

Empirum

=====

Depending on Empirum server version, connectors may use different APIs and, of course, different ports.


1. Empirum v.12

In old Empirum versions, there are no API, and connectors use direct database connection to Empirum database.

a) Oracle

Default Oracle listener port is used, that can be configured in Oracle client configuration (listener.ora file)

tcp 1526 (oracle)

b) Microsoft MS SQL

Default MS SQL database connection port is used, that can be changed in SQL client configuration.

tcp 1433


2. Empirum v.12 R2 Patch2 and later

All Empirum versions since v.12 R2 Patch2 use Empirum API that works through single TCP port (can be configured in Empirum connector settings, together with Empirum API settings).

tcp 9100

Table1.TaskTitle: [Test]: [Connectors]: Documentation about ports used for communication by connectors and data providers
Table1.WiTitle: [Connectors]: Documentation about ports used for communication by connectors and data providers
Table1.WiDescription: Empirum

Table1.TaskTitle: [dev]: [Virtual Inventory]: Documentation about ports used for communication by connectors and data providers
Table1.TaskDescription:
=====

Citrix XenServer

=====

Contrary to documentation that claims SSL as default communication method, HTTP port is used by data provider.

tcp 80 (http)



=====

Microsoft Hyper-V

=====

Single port 5985 is used.

tcp 5985


=====

VMware vCenter

=====

tcp 443 (https)

Table1.TaskTitle: [Test]: [Virtual Inventory]: Documentation about ports used for communication by connectors and data providers
Table1.WiTitle: [Virtual Inventory]: Documentation about ports used for communication by connectors and data providers

Table1.TaskTitle: [dev]: [Inventory]: Documentation about ports used for communication by connectors and data providers
Table1.TaskDescription:
=====

Windows inventory:

=====

Windows Inventory data provider uses Active Directory ports.

Windows Server 2008 and later, Windows Vista and later

tcp 135 (epmap)

tcp 49152-65535

Windows 2000, Windows XP, and Windows Server 2003
tcp 1025-5000

Additional info about configuring Active Directory ports can be found here: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/224196


=====

Unix inventory

=====

Unix Inventory data provider uses SSH for connection.

tcp 22 (ssh)


=====

SCCM Inventory

=====

SCCM data provider works through MS SQL database connection.

tcp 1433 (ms-sql-s)

More about configuring MS SQL ports can be found here: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc646023.aspx



=====

Oracle Inventory

=====

This data provider uses pre-configured TCP port 3307 (can be updated through location settings).

tcp 3307



=====

AirWatch

=====

AirWatch data provider uses HTTPS protocol.

tcp 443 (https)


=====

Silverback

=====

Silverback data provider uses HTTPS protocol.

tcp 443 (https)



=====

Matrix42 Accounts

=====



=====

LIS - Online Update

=====

This data provider works through HTTPS port

tcp  443 (https)



=====

LDAP

=====

LDAP data provider obviously uses LDAP port

tcp 389 (ldap)



=====

Enterprise Manager

=====

EM data provider uses pre-configured tcp port 8099 (it's possible to configure port in the data provider settings)

tcp 8099

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T131079 - Windows Inventory partially fails during hardware inventory with a non admin user
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.1.0.1650 - WPM 8.1

2016-08-02 OHR:

Hi,

a customer is running Windows Inventory with a non-admin user and applied the workaround of adding the user to WMI namespaces.
(see http://helpfiles.matrix42-web.de/2015_EN/M42_WebDocu.htm#WM/CWM/SVS_ADM/Verbind/ADM_Inv_Providers.htm%3FTocPath%3DMatrix42%2520Workspace%2520Management%7CAdministration%7CIntegration%7CBuilt-In%2520Data%2520Providers%7CDiscovery%2520and%2520Inventory%2520for%2520Licensing%7CVirtual%2520Infrastructure%252C%2520Software%252C%2520and%2520Hardware%2520Inventory%7C_____1 under "Prerequisites for Windows Inventory")

Most of hardware inventory works, Software inventory does, too.

However the following error is logged:

2016-07-28 10:52:23 ERROR Error: HardwareInventoryProvider (SVDEETOPTSPSD02) - hardware inventory (Physical Memory) failed with error. Provider failure

At C:\Program Files (x86)\Matrix42\Matrix42 Workplace Management\DataGateway\Host\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Module\Matrix42.PowershellHelper.ps1:108 char:19

+         $result = Get-WmiObject @wmiparams

+                   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

  CategoryInfo: InvalidOperation: (:) [Get-WmiObject], ManagementException  FullyQualifiedErrorId: GetWMIManagementException,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetWmiObjectCommand

Inspite of the rest of the inventory being successful, the last inventory result is shown as failed. Error does not appear with an Admin user, but due to some customer-specific policy, admin users must not be used.

Customer is escalated. Please assist urgently because Windows Inventory needs to be rolled out and will likely run into this error on a large scale.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

We still have this issue mentioned in problem above on customer side.
We had some investigation  with Vasiliy Zhusma, but without inquiry, because of an existing hotfix request.
Currently we don't now how to proceed and I don't get an answer, I guess go on with an inquiry is more sensefull.

Current state:
We don't know if there is a problem with our system or with lotus notes servers.
The last mail, the customer exported, where the issue occoured, was successfully imported with svmmailchecker in our and development system. But it is not possible to import this mail again in customer system.

We would like to do a remote session to find our, why the svmmailchecker is not able to import the dat file on customer system. As you see the current svmmailchecker.log is kinda useless, so maybe it is required to prepare some debugfiles for svmmailchecker.

Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Konietzny, Beatrice
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hi,

has someone an idea?
Symptoms:

Not all services assigned to a person can be returned. In return Wizard the following error occurs:

See attachment tmp51A6.jpg

and M42.zip

 

Some error message details:

Must specify valid information for parsing in the string.
System.ArgumentException: Must specify valid information for parsing in the string. at System.Enum.TryParseEnum(Type enumType, String value, Boolean ignoreCase, EnumResult& parseResult) at System.Enum.Parse(Type enumType, String value) at update4u.Portal.WebUI.Wizards.UnassignServices.SecondPage.RecalculateBookings(Guid[] bookingIds) at update4u.Portal.WebUI.Wizards.UnassignServices.SecondPage.ProccessRequiredServices() at update4u.Portal.WebUI.Wizards.UnassignServices.SecondPage.ValidatePageData() at update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.Controls.Wizards.WizardTemplates.WizardDataPageControl`1.OnNext() at update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.Controls.Wizards.WizardControl.Go() at update4u.SPS.WebUI.Components.Controls.Wizards.WizardControl.OnPreRender(EventArgs e)

Reproduction:
Assign a staff a service, or order through the portal, then take back the service again.

Two service the error occurs. There is no dependence on whether these services have made a catalog, provisioning workflow or any status or a technical target.

[Inquiry]: T130466 - Silverback Data Provider fails on GDI "Import SIM Cards" - Class ST-SPSAssetTypeSIM does not contain attribute PhoneNumber!
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.1.0.1651 - WPM 8.1

2016-08-05 OHR:

Hi,

in a customer environment the Silverback Data Provider fails on import sequence "Import SIM Cards". Error message says:

update4u.SPS.DataLayer.query.ExpressionParserException: Class ST-SPSAssetTypeSIM does not contain attribute PhoneNumber!
    bei update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Query.VisitorAddSchemaInfo.Visit(AttributeExpression expression)
    bei update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Query.AttributeExpression.AcceptVisitor(BaseExpressionVisitor visitor)
    bei update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Query.VisitorAddSchemaInfo.Visit(AttributeExpression expression)
    bei update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Query.AttributeExpression.AcceptVisitor(BaseExpressionVisitor visitor)
    bei update4u.SPS.DataLayer.Query.VisitorAddSchemaInfo.Visit(BinaryOperatorExpression expression)

According to Michael Ascher ST-SPSAssetTypeSIM is a table which is created and fully managed be the GDIE sequence. So if the attribute is missing there, there might be something wrong with the GDI.

Please assist with fixing this issue.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 
PRB28030: Export of VCards matches business contact attributes with private attributes
PRB27935: Address Book configurable items are displayed without line breaks
PRB28135: Address Book creates line breaks wrapping words randomly
PRB28000: Display of currency USD and CAD in Portal causes confusion because both use the same "Dollar Sign"
PRB28210: Demand Detection not working with 8.0.2!
PRB28188: SCCM Provider created services: deinstallation and repairmode not available and can not be changed
PRB28230: Returning a service as cost center manager: Costcenter of costcenter manager will be taken
PRB28412: Pages in Portal are requested twice when using the menu (IE 11)
PRB28491: SCCM Provider may create permanent cpu usage on IIS M42Service pool, because of an loop when resuming the worklfow
PRB27954: On returning one service which is the dependency of another service(s) of one user, all services of all users in the same cost center are returned additionally
PRB28076: catalog with more than 250 items cannot be exported
PRB28443 - Service currency displays not properly in portal
PRB28408: Hostcommon runs on 100% cpu an remains in this state (IVAN)
PRB28174: Partial approval of different services with same service as dependency not possible
PRB27939: Service Details inside bundle should show information more specific to the currently used catalog
PRB28507: Missing Approval Date in bookings of Adjustment Orders causes report issues
PRB28221: Demand Detection of 'invisible' services
PRB28337: Instanz einer Buchung wird im Portal nicht angezeigt
PRB28598: Rebooking service in Portal by cost center responsible creates no approvals
PRB28485: Searching in Catalog (Portal) is defective - false results are displayed

PRB28121: Service cannot be ordered second time, once the provisioning has been canceled
PRB28296: Demand Detection does not allow other CI's than Account and Assets from spsassetclassbase
PRB28487: Demand Detection does not detect uninstallations, when consumers is using service more than once
PRB28590: Demand Detection does not work correctly when row from LCMDemandEntityClassBase is used in ASQL Target Statement

PRB28496  Wrong pricing in Self Service Portal after checkout with bundle surcharge options
PRB28585: Console Assign Service > Technical target can not be selected, when recipient is not in audience of selected catalog
PRB28502: Additional Services for Installation, Repair and Uninstallation Charges cannot be used in conjunction with custom pricing

PRB28273: Displayed attributes in Address Book cannot be changed
PRB28452: "Import Inventory Data" cannot be deactivated in SCCM Data Provider
PRB28755: Softwareservices from EM won't be triggered for installation in EM server

PRB28855: Assign Service leads to internal server error due to currency error

PRB28758: SCCM Data Provider sometimes creates duplicates of computer records, inspite of complete information in XML files and unique machine IDs

PRB28363: SCCM provider updates SKU every time
PRB28871: Data Providers always overwrite Stock Keeping Units
PRB28876: AirWatch Connector struggles to import data from AirWatch 8.3-8.4 
PRB28946: Installation of multiple SCCM services in a single order fails
PRB28960: Error sending large file via Data Gateway package

- string DomainName

- int RemoteControlType
- string ComputerName
- string ComputerIP
Returns:
- Remote Client Path (template).

[ready] Test: STS, add token refresh flow and storing refresh token fingerprint in db
Table1.WiTitle: STS, add token refresh flow and storing refresh token fingerprint in db
Table1.WiDescription:
Implement an API access token flow, we need this for mobile app.

Implement an interface to get an API token from the STS in case you have a valid access token (this means you are authenticated by STS). The fingerprint of the API token together with all available info (something like the referrer, the user agent, the time the token was requested, the lifetime) must be stored at the user object of the requesting user. the user object must get an UI to remove this tokens for his account, perhaps in his profile UI.
The API token can be used by another new interface to get a new access token, without already having a valid access token. The code here checks if the API token is present in the db and then generates the access token for the user that has the API token assigned. Also the user is authenticated against the db, means the security is refreshed (rule cache, datalayer cache).
The API token is valid for a relative long time, months or even a year. the access token generated by the API token is valid for only a short time, 2 hours or so.
An API token can be used to generate a new API token, the old token will be invalidated (deleted) in the db.

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T131236 - Silverback Provider assigned wrong person as principal user
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: Matrix42 Silverback 5.0.2.14

Hello,

please check our API request and the data we retrive from api.
A customer, where the admin some provision the mobile devices himself in silverback is the principal user of these devices in service store.
It seems that entry device_user_userEMail in our XML contains the wrong value.
Our collegues from Silverback support executed an request in the api of silverback themself for a device:
    "user": {
        "userIdentifier": "bGRhcF9iLmJvcnNjaGJlcmdAaW50cmEuYWR1bGxhbS5jaA==",
        "userType": "LDAP",
        "devices": null,
        "userStatus": "unlocked",
        "createdAt": "2016-08-04T06:24:32.343",
        "userName": "b.borschberg@intra.adullam.ch",
        "userFirstname": "Carole",
        "userLastname": "Francisco Oradubanya",
        "userEMail": "c.francisco@adullam.ch"
      }
The Mail in username and userEmail can be different.
The mail visible in UserName is set by the person, who provision/enrolls the device.
So it is possible that this value is not the real current user.

Please check if our provider gets the value for device_user_userEMail from UserEmail or UserName in silverback API.
In case UserName is used, it is a bug and I will create a problem for it.

[Inquiry]: T129604 - Objects cannot be deleted generally
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hajzyk, Peter
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hi Team,

On customer's system no objects like for example computers or assets cannot be deleted.
We tested it with users with Admin permissions and with Service account (role: Administration)
If you open an object which you want to delete, the red X is greyed out and you cannot delete the object.
This behaviour happens in all objects.
In some grid layouts it you mark more than one object, the red X changes to red and you can delete, but if you mark only one deleting is not possible.

We have checked if some delete actions are prohibited in user roles but it's not the case here.

Could You help us with it finding the root cause of this issue?

Thanks in advance

Table1.TaskTitle: update env

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.0.2.1580 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
- PRB28129: Empirum devices (collected by Device Discovery) will be ignored by Empirum Connector Import
- PRB28243: Empirum connector: There should be a second account in empirum location configuration for "complete computer inventory" usage
- PRB28361: Setting "Device mapping by device code" from the empirum connector doesnt work
 
Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

3. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

4. Copy the files:
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.Empirum.BizLayer.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.Empirum.WebUI.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\Web\DlgControls\SPSConnectorTypeEmpirum\LocationDetails.ascx"
 "<Installationfolder>\Config\DTS\Empirum\DeviceImportFromEmpirum.xml"
  into a separate backup directory

5. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

6. Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28243_Hotfix.bat

7. Perform an IISRESET
 
8. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

9. (PRB28243) Open Matrix42 Service Store console -> go to Empirum location -> define Web Console User credentials

10. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T130956 - Provisioning workflows sometimes don't get started
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hello,

a customer reports that sometimes their provisoning workflows do not start when the order was created.
I didn't found any error in specific. There is no approval workflow for the 2 servcies, where this problem is present. So the provisioning should start directly.
Windows log, app fabric dashboard and our logs do not deliver anything to the times, when the booking was created.
The only problem i can see, is that every night all workflows going into state faulted state and recovery directly after it. Maybe the latest version do not get activated again.

Is this faulted state on / off topic mostly at ~4 o clock a problem, which should be analyzed, or should we have a look somewhere else.

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T131664 - SCCM Data Provider duplicates in collected data
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Illi, Jennifer
Found in build: 8.1.0.1651 - WPM 8.1

Symptoms:

After data collection via 'SCCM Data Provider' some of the entries (computers, sound cards, graphic cards, etc.) have duplicates in XML files.

By checking the ZIP file 'M42Analyse' you'll find the Import logs as export. With the entries from the import logs you can find the duplicates in the XML files in ZIP file 'SCCMAnalyse'.

Prerequisites:

Full Import via SCCM Data Provider. Only reproducible in customers environment.

Reproduction:

/

Result:

Duplicates in XML files of SCCM Inventory.

Expected Result:

Only one entry for each product (computers, sound cards, graphic cards, etc.).

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T131365 - Rhenus LCM Query runs more than 6 minutes
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hello,

the attached query runs about 6 minutes in rhenus environment. Could you please check where this query comes from and if this can be optimized?
You can also can check this query on the latest rhenus database backup.

SELECT TOP 1
/*ID*/ [T-0].[ID] AS [ID]
,/*Expression-ObjectID*/ [T-0].[Expression-ObjectID] AS [Expression-ObjectID]
,/*LicenseModel*/ [T-0].[LicenseModel] AS [LicenseModel]
,/*Software*/ [T-0].[Software] AS [Software]
,/*Anonymous*/ [T-0].[Anonymous] AS [Anonymous]
,/*MissingLicensesCount*/ [T-0-2].[MissingLicensesCount] AS [MissingLicensesCount]
,/*Target*/ [T-0].[Target] AS [Target]
,/*TargetComputer*/ [T-0-4-0].[ID] AS [TargetComputer]
,/*Location*/ [T-0-3].[Location] AS [Location]
,/*OU*/ [T-0-3].[OU] AS [OU]
,/*CostCenter*/ [T-0-3].[CostCenter] AS [CostCenter]
,/*SoftwareOU*/ [T-0-1-1].[OU] AS [SoftwareOU]
,/*GlobalSoftware*/ [T-0-1].[GlobalSoftware] AS [GlobalSoftware]
,/*LicenseProvider*/ [T-0-1].[LicenseProvider] AS [LicenseProvider]

FROM
 [M42STORE].[dbo].[LCMLicenseDemandClassBase] AS [T-0]
/*W-7*/ LEFT JOIN [M42STORE].[dbo].[SPSSoftwareClassBase] AS [T-0-1] ON [T-0].[Software] = [T-0-1].[ID]
/*W-8*/ LEFT JOIN [M42STORE].[dbo].[SchemaRelation-SPSSoftwareClassBase2SPSSoftwareClassBase] AS [T-0-1NM-0] ON [T-0-1].[ID] = [T-0-1NM-0].[LicensesValidFrom]
/*W-8*/ LEFT JOIN [M42STORE].[dbo].[SPSSoftwareClassBase] AS [T-0-1MN-0] ON [T-0-1NM-0].[LicensesValidFor] = [T-0-1MN-0].[ID]
/*W-9*/ LEFT JOIN [M42STORE].[dbo].[LCMLicenseDemandClassState] AS [T-0-2] ON ([T-0].[Expression-ObjectID] = [T-0-2].[Expression-ObjectID])
/*W-11*/ LEFT JOIN [M42STORE].[dbo].[SPSCommonClassBase] AS [T-0-3] ON ([T-0].[Expression-ObjectID] = [T-0-3].[Expression-ObjectID])
/*J-2*/ LEFT JOIN [M42STORE].[dbo].[LCMDemandEntityClassBase] AS [T-0-4] ON [T-0].[Target] = [T-0-4].[ID]
/*J-3*/ LEFT JOIN [M42STORE].[dbo].[SPSComputerClassBase] AS [T-0-4-0] ON ([T-0-4].[Expression-ObjectID] = [T-0-4-0].[Expression-ObjectID])
/*J-8*/ LEFT JOIN [M42STORE].[dbo].[SPSCommonClassBase] AS [T-0-1-1] ON ([T-0-1].[Expression-ObjectID] = [T-0-1-1].[Expression-ObjectID])
 WHERE (((((((( NOT  EXISTS( (SELECT [A-r1].[ID] FROM [M42STORE].[dbo].[SchemaRelation-SPSAssetClassLicense2LCMDemandEntityClassBase] [A-r1]  WHERE ([A-r1].[RestrictedOnDevices] = @SelectParameter0) ) )  OR  EXISTS( (SELECT [A-r2].[ID] FROM [M42STORE].[dbo].[SchemaRelation-SPSAssetClassLicense2LCMDemandEntityClassBase] [A-r2]  WHERE (([A-r2].[RestrictedOnDevices] = @SelectParameter0) AND ([A-r2].[Licenses] = [T-0].[Target])) ) ) ) AND ([T-0-1MN-0].[ID] = @SelectParameter1)) AND ([T-0].[Ignored] = 0)) AND ([T-0].[LicenseModel] = @SelectParameter2)) AND ([T-0-2].[MissingLicensesCount] > 0)) AND ([T-0-2].[State] = 103)) AND ([T-0-3].[Location] = @SelectParameter3)) AND ([T-0-3].[OU] = @SelectParameter4));

[11.08.2016 08:41:00] Beatrice Konietzny: was meint Pavel damit? Und was versteht der unter: engine activation 'Setup calculated attributes Engine Activation'.                          hier mal noch die komplette Antwort - --> This exception appears not in CoRu but in engine activation 'Setup calculated attributes Engine Activation'. And this engine activation is used to calcaluate actual proxy person for user. So, this exception is not critical but it can leads to sending/not sending emails about ticket changes to wrong person. Seems that SQL server cofigured to use German regional setting (date time format at least). If customer can reconfigure SQL to use English regional settings then it may help. Or we can organize remote session to check the problem and find another solution.

Hi Team,

a customer has the following issue after update to WSM version 8.0.2 and applying HOTFIX for PRB28452:

After start of SCCM Data Provider it generates the error message "System.ArgumentException: Attribute Name max length 50 exceeded", see attachment "Error SCCM Connector.txt"
