Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T132281 - LIS-Update fails with .NET error
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.1.1.1674 - WPM 8.1.1

2016-11-15 OHR:

Hi,

a customer has issues with performing LIS update. The same error appears in LIS Update wizard and in LIS Data Provider. The Data Gateway generally works, other Data Providers work and the service layer engine does, too.

Please assist.
Kind regards,
Oliver

Error message:

Unable to complete operation. Error occurred during request processing. See error details.
Fehlerdetails:
System.ServiceModel.FaultException: The server was unable to process the request due to an internal error.  For more information about the error, either turn on IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults (either from ServiceBehaviorAttribute or from the <serviceDebug> configuration behavior) on the server in order to send the exception information back to the client, or turn on tracing as per the Microsoft .NET Framework SDK documentation and inspect the server trace logs.

Server stack trace:
   at System.ServiceModel.Channels.ServiceChannel.ThrowIfFaultUnderstood(Message reply, MessageFault fault, String action, MessageVersion version, FaultConverter faultConverter)
   at System.ServiceModel.Channels.ServiceChannel.HandleReply(ProxyOperationRuntime operation, ProxyRpc& rpc)
   at System.ServiceModel.Channels.ServiceChannel.Call(String action, Boolean oneway, ProxyOperationRuntime operation, Object[] ins, Object[] outs, TimeSpan timeout)
   at System.ServiceModel.Channels.ServiceChannelProxy.InvokeService(IMethodCallMessage methodCall, ProxyOperationRuntime operation)
   at System.ServiceModel.Channels.ServiceChannelProxy.Invoke(IMessage message)

Exception rethrown at [0]:
   at System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy.HandleReturnMessage(IMessage reqMsg, IMessage retMsg)
   at System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy.PrivateInvoke(MessageData& msgData, Int32 type)
   at Matrix42.DataProvider.LisUpdate.LisSessionManager.ILisSessionManagerService.GetUpdateRequest(GetUpdateRequestRequest request)
   at Matrix42.DataProvider.LisUpdate.LisSessionManager.LisSessionManagerServiceClient.Matrix42.DataProvider.LisUpdate.LisSessionManager.ILisSessionManagerService.GetUpdateRequest(GetUpdateRequestRequest request)
   at Matrix42.DataProvider.LisUpdate.LisSessionManager.LisSessionManagerServiceClient.GetUpdateRequest(Int32& CurrentProductVersion, DateTime& LastUpdateDate, Int32& TargetProductVersion, String& UserName)
   at update4u.LicenseManager.LIS.Components.UserIdentity.InitUserIdentity()
   at update4u.LicenseManager.LIS.Components.UserIdentity.Init()
   at Matrix42.DataProvider.LisUpdate.LisUpdateProvider.Initialization(DataProviderContext ctx)
   at Matrix42.DataProvider.LisUpdate.LisUpdateProvider.GetData(DataProviderContext ctx)

++++++++++++++

2016-12-02 OHR:

Hi,

I turned on IncludeExceptionDetailInFault, but the error message is still the same:

The server was unable to process the request due to an internal error.  For more information about the error, either turn on IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults (either from ServiceBehaviorAttribute or from the <serviceDebug> configuration behavior) on the server in order to send the exception information back to the client, or turn on tracing as per the Microsoft .NET Framework SDK documentation and inspect the server trace logs.

The database login issue, you are referring to, is most likely unrelated. It does not appear in recent logs.

Since I am not a developer and the Microsoft .NET Framework SDK documentation (what I found was this: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/sfbfw58f(v=vs.85).aspx) is clearly written for developers, it will not make much sense to let me (try to) do this.

I propose a remote session with you (or somebody from dev at least) to analyse this in the customer environment.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Table1.TaskTitle: PRB29230: SCCM provider doesn't change installed flag of inventorized applications

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1651 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which is fixed:
- PRB28758 - SCCM Data Provider sometimes creates duplicates of computer records, inspite of complete information in XML files and unique machine IDs
- PRB28908: Runtime of SCCM import takes to long - Import of huge environtments not possible
- PRB28943: LDAP Data Provider fails when collected data exceeds 28MB of volume
- PRB29018: SCCM Data Provider cannot import from SCCM 2007
- PRB29021: Error Message in SCCM Dataprovider - Object reference not set to an instance of an object
- PRB29156: SCCM API call has to be adjusted
- PRB29230: SCCM provider doesn't change installed flag of inventorized applications

Installation:
=============

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET

3. Disable SCCM Inventory Provider.

4. Open file "Get duplicates of computers managed by SCCM.sql" in MS SQl Server Management Studio and connect to the M42Database. 
   Execute the script. You will get a list of computers imported twice or more times from SCCM ( having the same name ). You should remove these duplicates from M42 Application
   manually and leave one computer from each duplicates group only.

5. Open file "Remove fragment duplicates imported from SCCM.sql" in MS SQl Server Management Studio and connect to the M42Database. 
   Execute the script. 

6. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

7. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

8. Copy the files 

  "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.AssetManager.BizLogic.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.Design.dll"

Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hello,

basically it is the same issue like reported in 69293.
Consulting built a workflow, which only executes and powershell script. Please see attached PKG file.
This script, executed over wf engine, will fail after one day and will work again as soon as the iis got reseted.
Executing over ISE still does work at this times.

Suggestions like dispose the connection did not work very well.

Martin Kohler wants to create work with PSO.
Please get in touch with ahmet.virit@matrix42.com vom consulting. He built workflow / script.

Comment from vadim:
Hi Martin,


Personally I have not had a time to check it, just really overwhelmed with the amount of concurrent task. So, if Vladimir did not check it, most likely the progress is zero.


But why this ticket is so "special", we need to introduce the new procedure for it handling, and not just use a standard, like sure, it is a bug, create a Probem, not sure that is a bug, create an Inquery.
Having such artifacts we can easily plan it in sprint.


Best Regards,
Vadim

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.2.1712 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
- PRB28758: SCCM Data Provider sometimes creates duplicates of computer records, inspite of complete information in XML files and unique machine IDs

 
Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Open file "Get duplicates of computers managed by SCCM.sql" in MS SQl Server Management Studio and connect to the M42Database. 
   Execute the script. You will get a list of computers imported twice or more times from SCCM ( having the same name ). You should make decision what are duplicates. 
   And you should remove these duplicates from M42 Application manually and leave one computer from each duplicates group only.

3. Disable SCCM Inventory Provider.

4. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

5. Open file "Remove fragment duplicates imported from SCCM.sql" in MS SQl Server Management Studio and connect to the M42Database. 
   Execute the script. 

6. Perform an IISRESET
 
7. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

8. Check the functionality. 

9. Activate SCCM Inventory Provider and Check GDIE logs after it is completed.

[ready] test: [Hotfix]: Hotfix_8.1.2.1712_20161121 - PRB29241
Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.2.1712 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:

PRB29146: Close Change Activity Fails workflow with timeout exception
PRB29241: LDAP Data collection need to much time and need improvements
PRB29168 Service Desk on UUX blocking issues:

HINT: there is folder with videos regarding most of changes in folder <hotfix>/video

Content:
1. [BUG] Send Email Action- > Users and Subject is not prefilled from selected Ticket

2. [BUG] Edit of incident will reset status to New after pressing Save/Done

3. [BUG] Journal: Journal in readonly mode in Incident Edit dialog is also readonly. But must be editable always

4. [BUG] Journal: Problem with difficulties to write journal entries when there are already several present. You needed to scroll. Now

5. [BUG] Journal and RichTextBox: Copy/Paste of richtext with images was not working

6. [BUG] Journal: Btn add was not always activate for journal when adding new

7. [BUG] Titles of Views in Dialogs are always shown in English, even if other  language is active. Incident Edit dialog for example
                                                                                                                                   
8. [BUG]: Adding new Wizard which calls Post Service doesn't work

9. [BUG]: DateTime control is not correctly shown in IE11 (See Track Working Time action)

10. [Feature] Object Picker: It is not possible to search by part of the name using '%' as in previous versions. For example find initiator by his first name

11. [Feature] Automatic accept of Incident when creating it in Agent Console. Configurable in UUX Service Desk Global Settings. Disabled by default

12. [Feature] Automatic time tracking  in UUX for actions Close, Forward, Pause, Return To Role

13. [Feature] Actions can be shown in Edit Dialog. (Added attribute "Show on Edit Dialog"). Action "Take Over"  is shown by default here

14. [Feature] Actions, Widgets can be hidden to be shown in UUX. Attribute Enabled added to Action Dialog. To get changes applied - iisreset still needed

15. [Feature] Transfering calls from Incident and Person Preview when clicking on call icon placed near phone number

16. [Feature] Single attachment control added and used in Change edit dialog

17. [Feature] Adding datasource extension base on Data Definition (edited)

18. [Feature] Service method added for Changing Deadline of Ticket

[Inquiry]: T135199 - collecting inventory data of XenServer
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Schenten, Kevin
Found in build: 8.1.1.1674 - WPM 8.1.1

The customer is using XenServer with guest Systems (I don't know if it's XenApp or XenDesktop, but will find out if necessary). What he want's to achiev is, collecting inventory data of the host Server (XenServer) and the host-guest relationship.

The host-guest relationship can be achieved by the provider. But no inventory data is collected. According to this KB arcticle it should, I guess: https://help.matrix42.com/06_Platform/Matrix42_Workspace_Management_(Service_Store)/Platform_and_Database/Attribute_Mapping_for_Hyper-V%2C_XenServer_and_vCenter_Inventory

The main Problem is, that nobody in Support realy know anything about that Provider. I would appreciate if you can give some instructions how and when to use it and what it actually does.

Thanks in advance (:

 

2016-12-21 KSN:

Hi Denis, thx for the documentation which included many Information but unfotunately not the one I was looking for. The customers Needs to get Knowledge of the Hardware inventory of their XenServers. The documentation was all about remote application usage tracking and software inventory.
So, how can we make an Hardware inventory of the XenServer? As Xen is a Linux distribution I thought about the Linux Provider, but as far as I know it doesn't Support xen. How can we get those information?

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 7.2.2.1382 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
- PRB27703: For Fingerprints the link “Active Installations” in Object Details displays also Computers with a link to AUT-Fingerprints where the Software is not installed anymore
- PRB28053: Action "Transfer License" does not work across different Compliance Company Codes due to mismatch of CCC license and assigned software product
- PRB28060: Action "Set License Custodian" does not work for user defined software products
- PRB28378: LIS online update fails caused by [ symbol
- PRB27741 - Processing the LIS Update fails with a type with ID 000000
- PRB28334: LIS Update fails with a deadlock Process ID 250
- PRB29218: SQL Queries and execution plan optmisation in LCM
 
Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files:
"<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.BizLogic.dll" 
  "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.Engine.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.WorkProcess.Core.dll" 
"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\Matrix42.WorkProcess.Core.dll" 
"<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.BizLogic.dll" 
"<Installationfolder>\Web\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.WebUI.dll" 
"<Installationfolder>\Web\DlgControls\LicenseManager\SPSSoftwareType\PurchasedLicenses.ascx" 
   into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Run <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28060_PRB28053_Hotfix.bat

8. Run "License Management - Data Batch Processing" engine activation

9. Perform an IISRESET
 
10. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

11. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T137278 - Rhenus: custom script for global License Model replacement (on behalf of TBO)
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

2016-11-24 OHR:

Hi,

customer Rhenus has a requirement for which Torsten Boch has committed a developer.

The requirement is:

Customer wants to create custom versions of some license models, which shall replace the original license model in all related objects. In details this means: the customer enters the name of the old license model, the name of the new license model and a script does the following:

  1. The new license model replaces the old one in all Software Products that use the old license model
  2. The new license model replaces the old one in all lists of relevant license models. The old license model shall be removed from this list and the new one takes its place
  3. All license requirements using the old license model will adapt the new one
  4. All license inventory records using the old license model will adapt the new one

As mentioned, Torsten Boch agreed that such a script shall be provided by Dev. For any questions on details and specifications, please approach Torsten Boch.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Table1.TaskTitle: PRB29254: SCCM Service Provisioning finishes directly after sending the task to SCCM and does not wait for a positive feedback anymore

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.2.1712 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 

PRB29146: Close Change Activity Fails workflow with timeout exception
PRB29241: LDAP Data collection need to much time and need improvements
PRB29156: SCCM API call has to be adjusted
PRB29254: SCCM Service Provisioning finishes directly after sending the task to SCCM and does not wait for a positive feedback anymore

PRB29168 Service Desk on UUX blocking issues:

HINT: there is folder with videos regarding most of changes in folder <hotfix>/video

Content:
1. [BUG] Send Email Action- > Users and Subject is not prefilled from selected Ticket

2. [BUG] Edit of incident will reset status to New after pressing Save/Done

3. [BUG] Journal: Journal in readonly mode in Incident Edit dialog is also readonly. But must be editable always

4. [BUG] Journal: Problem with difficulties to write journal entries when there are already several present. You needed to scroll. Now 

5. [BUG] Journal and RichTextBox: Copy/Paste of richtext with images was not working

6. [BUG] Journal: Btn add was not always activate for journal when adding new

7. [BUG] Titles of Views in Dialogs are always shown in English, even if other  language is active. Incident Edit dialog for example
                                                                                                                                    
8. [BUG]: Adding new Wizard which calls Post Service doesn't work

9. [BUG]: DateTime control is not correctly shown in IE11 (See Track Working Time action)

10. [Feature] Object Picker: It is not possible to search by part of the name using '%' as in previous versions. For example find initiator by his first name

11. [Feature] Automatic accept of Incident when creating it in Agent Console. Configurable in UUX Service Desk Global Settings. Disabled by default

12. [Feature] Automatic time tracking  in UUX for actions Close, Forward, Pause, Return To Role

13. [Feature] Actions can be shown in Edit Dialog. (Added attribute "Show on Edit Dialog"). Action "Take Over"  is shown by default here

14. [Feature] Actions, Widgets can be hidden to be shown in UUX. Attribute Enabled added to Action Dialog. To get changes applied - iisreset still needed

15. [Feature] Transfering calls from Incident and Person Preview when clicking on call icon placed near phone number

16. [Feature] Single attachment control added and used in Change edit dialog

17. [Feature] Adding datasource extension base on Data Definition (edited)

18. [Feature] Service method added for Changing Deadline of Ticket



Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
  
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Backup the files:

"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Common.dll"

into a separate backup directory

6. Backup the folder

7. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

8. Execute "<Installationfolder>\Config\ServiceDeskHotfix.bat",

9. Perform an IISRESET

10. Start the Windows Services

- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

11. Clean browser cache on client

12. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: Optimize building Where Expression for DataSet View
Table1.WiTitle: Optimize building Where Expression for DataSet View
Table1.WiDescription:
Use JOIN clause for SPSCommonClassBase when the response data is a single type

((JOIN(SPSCommonClassBase,l.UsedInTypeSPSActivityTypeIncident=r.UsedInType).=State IN (204)))
 And JOIN(SpsActivityClassBase,l.UsedInTypeSPSActivityTypeIncident=r.UsedInTypeSPSActivityTypeIncident)[=Creator IN (CurrentUserId()) or Initiator IN (CurrentUserId()) or Recipient IN (CurrentUserId()) or 
 initiator in subquery(SPSUserClassBase as u, u.id,u.ActualProxyPerson=CURRENTUSERID()) or 
 ID IN SUBQUERY([SchemaRelation-SPSActivityClassBase2SPSUserClassBase] as attachedUsers,     attachedUsers.AttachedUsers, attachedUsers.AttachedActivities = CURRENTUSERID()) or
 RecipientRole in  Subquery([SchemaRelation-SPSSecurityClassRole2SPSUserClassBase] as roles, roles.=members.=T(SPSSecurityClassRole).=ID, roles.MemberOf = CURRENTUSERID())]

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T136961 - Rhenus: Custom Form in License dialog cannot save "Valid From" and "Valid Until" dates
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Scherer, Alexander
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

2016-12-27 BKY:
Hi,

in the attachment is the requested file

2016-11-28 OHR:

Hi,

customer Rhenus has the following issue:

In CI License Inventory the General page was customised while the customer was still on 7.0.1.1242. Since the environment was updated to 8.0.2.1580, there is the following issue:

  1. Customer creates a Subscription License and fills in all necessary fields
  2. Fields "Valid From" and "Valid Until" are filled and the License saved
  3. On Save the values in these 2 date fields are removed and the license saved without. Therefore validation fails because these dates are missing.

I temporarily tested this with the original form for 8.0.2.1580 and that works. So it is obvious that the customer's custom form and presumably therefore outdated JScripts are to blame here. Here is the problem:

Rhenus does not accept reverting to original and rebuilding their custom for as a solution!

I have attached the exported changes of the CI. Please check what is wrong with it and how it can be fixed without rebuilding the entire form.

Kind regards,
Oliver

The problem was when:
http.post('api/dataquery/relationItems', requestInfo);

whereExpresion was:
T(PLWEWorkflowDescriptorClassBase).Context = '2' or (
T(PLSLComponentClassBase).Type = 4 AND
T(PLSLXamlComponentClassBase).IntegrationContext = '2' AND
T(SPSCommonClassBase).State = '10102'
)

but if wrap whereExpresion with `( ... )` then problem will be solved.

I did it on client side but this should be done on server side too.

Table1.TaskDescription: PRB29168 Service Desk on UUX blocking issues:
Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.2.1712 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:

PRB29146: Close Change Activity Fails workflow with timeout exception
PRB29241: LDAP Data collection need to much time and need improvements
PRB29168 Service Desk on UUX blocking issues:

HINT: there is folder with videos regarding most of changes in folder <hotfix>/video

Content:
1. [BUG] Send Email Action- > Users and Subject is not prefilled from selected Ticket

2. [BUG] Edit of incident will reset status to New after pressing Save/Done

3. [BUG] Journal: Journal in readonly mode in Incident Edit dialog is also readonly. But must be editable always

4. [BUG] Journal: Problem with difficulties to write journal entries when there are already several present. You needed to scroll. Now

5. [BUG] Journal and RichTextBox: Copy/Paste of richtext with images was not working

6. [BUG] Journal: Btn add was not always activate for journal when adding new

7. [BUG] Titles of Views in Dialogs are always shown in English, even if other  language is active. Incident Edit dialog for example
                                                                                                                                   
8. [BUG]: Adding new Wizard which calls Post Service doesn't work

9. [BUG]: DateTime control is not correctly shown in IE11 (See Track Working Time action)

10. [Feature] Object Picker: It is not possible to search by part of the name using '%' as in previous versions. For example find initiator by his first name

11. [Feature] Automatic accept of Incident when creating it in Agent Console. Configurable in UUX Service Desk Global Settings. Disabled by default

12. [Feature] Automatic time tracking  in UUX for actions Close, Forward, Pause, Return To Role

13. [Feature] Actions can be shown in Edit Dialog. (Added attribute "Show on Edit Dialog"). Action "Take Over"  is shown by default here

14. [Feature] Actions, Widgets can be hidden to be shown in UUX. Attribute Enabled added to Action Dialog. To get changes applied - iisreset still needed

15. [Feature] Transfering calls from Incident and Person Preview when clicking on call icon placed near phone number

16. [Feature] Single attachment control added and used in Change edit dialog

17. [Feature] Adding datasource extension base on Data Definition (edited)

18. [Feature] Service method added for Changing Deadline of Ticket

 

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Backup the files:

[Inquiry]: T137606 - #IR00450 - Workflows failing on create task activity
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.1.1.1674 - WPM 8.1.1

On customer site from time to time all workflows start failing on the create task activity with this error:
System.InvalidOperationException: Beim aufrufenden Thread muss es sich um einen STA-Thread handeln, da dies für viele Komponenten der Benutzeroberfläche erforderlich ist.
   bei Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.ObjectReferenceProcessor.SetTextPlaceholders(String text, String activityPropertyName, Int32 culture)
   bei Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.ObjectReferenceProcessor.GenerateFinalHtml(String rawHtml, Int32 culture, String activityPropertyName, Boolean getPlainText)
   bei Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.ObjectReferenceProcessor.GenerateStringFromResourceDescriptor(ResourceDescriptor resource, String activityPropertyName, Boolean getPlainText)
   bei Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.CreateTicketActivity.FillTaskInfo(TicketBaseInfo taskInfo, ObjectReferenceProcessor processor, ActivityContext context)
   bei Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.TaskOperationActivity.FillTaskInfo(TicketBaseInfo taskInfo, ObjectReferenceProcessor processor, ActivityContext context)
   bei Matrix42.Workflows.Activities.CreateTask.Execute(NativeActivityContext context)
   bei System.Activities.NativeActivity.InternalExecute(ActivityInstance instance, ActivityExecutor executor, BookmarkManager bookmarkManager)
   bei System.Activities.Runtime.ActivityExecutor.ExecuteActivityWorkItem.ExecuteBody(ActivityExecutor executor, BookmarkManager bookmarkManager, Location resultLocation)

In the zip file you will find a screenshot from visual tracking. The consultant confirmed that every instance failed on create task.
after a serverreboot this error is gone for a while.
We have a log from 29.11. on this day this error happend the hole day.
on 30.11 a server reboot was performed.

any ideas how to proceed?

__________________________
Customer found out that this error seems to be related to an workflow of us.
See pointcollection.txt

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.1.1674 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:

PRB29044: RAM usage of Data Gateway Service grows until it needs restarting

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Backup the files:

"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"

"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"

into a separate backup directory

6. Backup the folder

"<Installationfolder>\WM"

7. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

8. Execute "<Installationfolder>\Config\PRB29044_hotfix.bat"

9. Perform an IISRESET

10. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

11. Clean browser cache on client

12. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver

2016-12-02 OHR:

Hi,

a escalated customer has the issue that LCM Batch processing does not remove obsolete License Requirements. Before you ask: the conditions to make the LRQ obsolete are being met. hostcommon.log always shows errors like this:

2016-11-29 01:19:55,344 ERROR 26 LCM (null) (null) (null)  (null) 8.1.0.1651   - Exception occurred during executing recovery process 'ResetInvalidDemands': System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Transaction (Process ID 128) was deadlocked on lock | communication buffer resources with another process and has been chosen as the deadlock victim. Rerun the transaction.
(Full message see attached log)

I also had the SQL Profiler running over night and captured deadlock graphs (see attachment). Proactively I sent Hotfix_8.1.0.1651_20160914 - PRB29071 to the customer but this did not help.

Please assist.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T137478 - Empirum Connector matching issue and LastScanDate 01.01.1970
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.0.0.1478 - WPM2015

2016-12-03 OHR:

Hi,

a customer has a strange Empirum Connector issue:

Some computers with current inventory data in Empirum are not properly updated in Service Store. According to the history records of their Service Store counterparts they were updated with a LastScanDate of 01.01.1970 by the Empirum Connector, but no software or hardware inventory was ever updated.

According to the staging DB these records have Import State = 3, but I did not find any Computer records that would explain any matching issues, like e.g. duplicates etc.

For testing I also used the DTS package from the 8.0.3 release, but that made no difference.

Empirum Connector is currently configured to match by Computer Name, which was changed as a result of this issue, because under standard matching the records were not matched either. So it seems this issue boils down to the Computer Name, but that was correctly filled in UI and database.

Side note: Empirum Connector is configured to not create new records. Computers are imported from AD and then filled with inventory data from Empirum if they are matched. This works for most computers but some are affected by this issue.

Please assist. Attchments, including Staging DB, can be found here: https://drive.google.com/a/matrix42.com/file/d/0B29bbNIyyg5OdktETUw5Nnd3YVE/view?usp=sharing

Kind regards,
Oliver

+++++++++++

2016-12-12 OHR:

Hi Serhiy,

as mentioned: SQL Server 2014 should work. INQ reopened so that you can post your results.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T131328 -  Hyper-V Inventory does not work with Windows 2008 Servers inspite of installed Codeplex Library
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hauner, Oliver
Found in build: 8.1.0.1651 - WPM 8.1

2016-12-03 OHR:

Hi,

Carl Zeiss has issues with inventorising Hyper-V Servers running Windows Server 2008. The Codeplex Library is installed, this has also been checked and configured by PSO, yet Hyper-V inventory still fails.

Errors:

2016-08-04 10:48:16 ERROR Error during processing HyperV env.: BRQPESAPP22 - Command execution stopped because the preference variable "ErrorActionPreference" or common parameter is set to Stop: [BRQPESAPP22] Connecting to remote server BRQPESAPP22 failed with the following error message : The client cannot connect to the destination specified in the request. Verify that the service on the destination is running and is accepting requests. Consult the logs and documentation for the WS-Management service running on the destination, most commonly IIS or WinRM. If the destination is the WinRM service, run the following command on the destination to analyze and configure the WinRM service: "winrm quickconfig". For more information, see the about_Remote_Troubleshooting Help topic.
2016-08-04 10:48:16 INFO Processing HyperV environment on host BRQPESAPP22.cznet.zeiss.org...
2016-08-04 10:48:16 ERROR Error during processing HyperV env.: BRQPESAPP22.cznet.zeiss.org - Command execution stopped because the preference variable "ErrorActionPreference" or common parameter is set to Stop: [BRQPESAPP22.cznet.zeiss.org] Connecting to remote server BRQPESAPP22.cznet.zeiss.org failed with the following error message : The WinRM client cannot process the request because the server name cannot be resolved. For more information, see the about_Remote_Troubleshooting Help topic.

According to Torsten Boch we officially claim to support such scenarios in conjunction with the Codeplex Library.

Please assist.

Kind regards,
Oliver

Table1.TaskDescription:
Hello Peter,
I could reproduce this issue.
I found workaround to resolve this problem in Empirum Server Side..
1) Open Empirum DBUtil in Empirum server. 
2) Open Install\Configure Services. 
3) Set Tcp Connection to Encrypted.
4) Restart Empirum Interface Hosting Service.


 
Regards.

[Inquiry]: T137494 - Temporary System Outage - System was not available - Error 500
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hajzyk, Peter
Found in build: 7.2.2.1382- WPM 2014 Service Pack 2 Patch 2

Hi Team,

our premium customer Phoenix Contact had temporary system outage. Now the system is available but they want to know why this outage happened.

Customer said, that the outage happened after they started LIS Update on 28.11.16 ca. at 5:30PM and after that the experienced an error processing LIS Update and other error Messages appeared see attachment "DOTNET-Framework_errors.png" and sstem wasn't accesible at all -> Tried to Login -> Error 500 and no login possible.
Could You help us to analyse what caused the outage? I've collected Log files and Eventlogs of application server, see attachments.

Thank You in advance.

Table1.WiTitle: Introduce caching mechanism for Data Queries
Table1.WiDescription:
To improve performance of the System it is proposed to provide an option for Data Queries setup caching.

For Data Queries of type SQL Query and maybe Data Defintion allow to confgirure caching:

[ x ] Allow Caching
     Caching interval [hh:mm] (Hint: Setup the interval for updating the data in Cache.)
[ x ] Culture Invariant (Hint: Signals that the Data Query result-set contains localizable values )

On Server:
Use ICacheManager service for storing data in cache
if cache is set, return "Max-age" and "Vary: Accept-language" in resposne

[Inquiry]: T129076 - Error on software installation via SCCM as bundle
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Hajzyk, Peter
Found in build: 8.1.0.1637- WPM 8.1

Hi Team,

Customer uses SCCM provisioning and has bundles defines with software services.
If services are ordered without bundle, it works properly but if software Services are ordered as BUNDLE, „Reconfigure SCCM Connector“-Task is created and no software is provisioned.

Slava gave me the following information, what has to be set that the bundle provisioning in SCCM works correctly:

Provisioning WF has to be romoved in bundle, so bundle has no WF and only the included services have „Provisioning – Install Software with SCCM“ WF set
and
In Bundle under "Service Elements" -> uncheck  "Skip provisioning of contained service elements" Option.

Customer done this 2 steps but Bundle provisioning in SCCM doesn't work either with this settings.

I talked to Torsten Boch and he told me that we Support SCCM Bundle provisioning and it should work.

We need help ASAP because customer escalated and needs the bundle SCCM provisioning and this case is opened longer time for now without solution.

Thank You in advance.

Table1.TaskTitle: [ready] test: [Hotfix]: Hotfix_8.1.0.1651_20161207 - PRB29047
Table1.TaskDescription: 2016-12-07 PBI: we don't know how to reproduce the problem locally. Just test if LDAP conector works with hotfix.
Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1651 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which are fixed:
PRB29047: It's possible that Account.xml has duplicated entrys

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
 
 
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"
 
5. Copy the files:


"<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"
"<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Ldap.dll"

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.2.1712 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 

- PRB29146: Close Change Activity Fails workflow with timeout exception
- PRB29241: LDAP Data collection need to much time and need improvements
- PRB29156: SCCM API call has to be adjusted
- PRB29254: SCCM Service Provisioning finishes directly after sending the task to SCCM and does not wait for a positive feedback anymore
- PRB29291: Change Management WF - Install Software with SCCM creates mulitple new tasks even if the existing ones are not closed yet

- PRB29168: Service Desk on UUX blocking issues:

HINT: there is folder with videos regarding most of changes in folder <hotfix>/video (download previos OBSOLETE HF "http://m42marketplacemediathek.blob.core.windows.net/mediathek/woocommerce_uploads/2016/Hotfix_8.1.2.1712_20161201%20-%20PRB29168%20PRB29241%20PRB29146%20PRB29156%20PRB29254.zip")

Content:
1. [BUG] Send Email Action- > Users and Subject is not prefilled from selected Ticket

2. [BUG] Edit of incident will reset status to New after pressing Save/Done

3. [BUG] Journal: Journal in readonly mode in Incident Edit dialog is also readonly. But must be editable always

4. [BUG] Journal: Problem with difficulties to write journal entries when there are already several present. You needed to scroll. Now 

5. [BUG] Journal and RichTextBox: Copy/Paste of richtext with images was not working

6. [BUG] Journal: Btn add was not always activate for journal when adding new

7. [BUG] Titles of Views in Dialogs are always shown in English, even if other  language is active. Incident Edit dialog for example
                                                                                                                                    
8. [BUG]: Adding new Wizard which calls Post Service doesn't work

9. [BUG]: DateTime control is not correctly shown in IE11 (See Track Working Time action)

10. [Feature] Object Picker: It is not possible to search by part of the name using '%' as in previous versions. For example find initiator by his first name

11. [Feature] Automatic accept of Incident when creating it in Agent Console. Configurable in UUX Service Desk Global Settings. Disabled by default

12. [Feature] Automatic time tracking  in UUX for actions Close, Forward, Pause, Return To Role

13. [Feature] Actions can be shown in Edit Dialog. (Added attribute "Show on Edit Dialog"). Action "Take Over"  is shown by default here

14. [Feature] Actions, Widgets can be hidden to be shown in UUX. Attribute Enabled added to Action Dialog. To get changes applied - iisreset still needed

15. [Feature] Transfering calls from Incident and Person Preview when clicking on call icon placed near phone number

16. [Feature] Single attachment control added and used in Change edit dialog

17. [Feature] Adding datasource extension base on Data Definition (edited)

18. [Feature] Service method added for Changing Deadline of Ticket



Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T139285 - Rhenus very slow action execution in incident management
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 8.0.2.1580 - WPM2015 Update 2

Hello,

rhenus has a critical issues in their system, please see attached mp4 file.
The actions and the hole dialog is very slow. We need someone who is able to analyze, why this execution time is so high.
Michael and me already had a look on the system.
SQL is not root cause, treshold logging with TIME>2000 shows no issues when the actions are executed.
There are NO long running sql scripts, which may block the system.
It also seems to be no issue with network. as you see in the attached zip file (rename T139285.ing to T138285.zip) the requests are mostly executed very fast in iis log.
The XML file from this zip is a network trace from IE 11 developer tools and shows that there are long executions because if some jscripts which are coming from customer.

We need a specialist who can analyze why the dialogs are so slow and which scripts may are the rootcause for this issue.

- PRB29254: SCCM Service Provisioning finishes directly after sending the task to SCCM and does not wait for a positive feedback anymore

 
Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Disable SCCM Inventory Provider.

3. Open file "Get duplicates of computers managed by SCCM.sql" in MS SQl Server Management Studio and connect to the M42Database. 
   Execute the script. You will get a list of computers imported twice or more times from SCCM ( having the same name ). You should remove these duplicates from M42 Application
   manually and leave one computer from each duplicates group only.

4. Open file "Remove fragment duplicates imported from SCCM.sql" in MS SQl Server Management Studio and connect to the M42Database. 
   Execute the script. 

5. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

6. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
   e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

7. Copy the files  
  "<Installationfolder>\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.BizLogic.dll" 
  "<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\svc\bin\Matrix42.Connectors.EmSccm.Client.dll"

  "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Activities\Matrix42.Connectors.EmSccm.Client.dll"

  "<Installationfolder>\ServiceRepository\BinaryComponents\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.dll"
  "<Installationfolder>\ServiceRepository\BinaryComponents\Matrix42.Connectors.Activities.Design.dll"
 
 into a separate backup directory

8. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

9. Run 1. <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB28758_PRB28774_Hotfix.bat
       2. <InstallationFolder>\Config\PRB29254_Hotfix.bat

10. Perform an IISRESET
 
11. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

12. Enable SCCM Inventory Provider.

13. Republish "Change Management WF - Install Software with SCCM" workflow

14. Check the functionality. 

15. Activate SCCM Inventory Provider and Check GDIE logs after it is completed.

[Inquiry]: T131709 - SQL Server configuration Max RAM is set to 512 MB if service account has sysadmin permissions
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Schenten, Kevin
Found in build: 8.1.0.1651 - WPM 8.1

This inq is created, after the solution of former inq (79848) didn't change the behaviour.

As soon as the Service account is granted sysadmin permissions, the max ram configuration of the SQL Server is set to 512MB

The customer ran this query without any effect to the issue:

DELETE FROM [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[InstancesTable]

WHERE LastUpdated IS NULL

 

DELETE FROM [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[ServiceDeploymentsTable]

WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT ServiceDeploymentId FROM [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[InstancesTable] WHERE [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[InstancesTable].ServiceDeploymentId = [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[ServiceDeploymentsTable].Id)

 

DELETE FROM [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[LockOwnersTable]

WHERE WorkflowHostType NOT IN (SELECT WorkflowHostType FROM [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[InstancesTable])

 

DELETE FROM [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[IdentityOwnerTable]

WHERE SurrogateLockOwnerId NOT IN (SELECT SurrogateLockOwnerId FROM [System.Activities.DurableInstancing].[LockOwnersTable])

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.2.1712 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 

- PRB29146: Close Change Activity Fails workflow with timeout exception
- PRB29241: LDAP Data collection need to much time and need improvements
- PRB29156: SCCM API call has to be adjusted
- PRB29254: SCCM Service Provisioning finishes directly after sending the task to SCCM and does not wait for a positive feedback anymore
- PRB29291: Change Management WF - Install Software with SCCM creates mulitple new tasks even if the existing ones are not closed yet
- PRB29168: Service Desk on UUX blocking issues
- PRB29321: It is not possible to login from MyWorspace to Service Store Instance with Single Sign-On

HINT: there is folder with videos regarding most of changes in folder <hotfix>/video (download previos OBSOLETE HF "http://m42marketplacemediathek.blob.core.windows.net/mediathek/woocommerce_uploads/2016/Hotfix_8.1.2.1712_20161201%20-%20PRB29168%20PRB29241%20PRB29146%20PRB29156%20PRB29254.zip")

Content:
1. [BUG] Send Email Action- > Users and Subject is not prefilled from selected Ticket

2. [BUG] Edit of incident will reset status to New after pressing Save/Done

3. [BUG] Journal: Journal in readonly mode in Incident Edit dialog is also readonly. But must be editable always

4. [BUG] Journal: Problem with difficulties to write journal entries when there are already several present. You needed to scroll. Now 

5. [BUG] Journal and RichTextBox: Copy/Paste of richtext with images was not working

6. [BUG] Journal: Btn add was not always activate for journal when adding new

7. [BUG] Titles of Views in Dialogs are always shown in English, even if other  language is active. Incident Edit dialog for example
                                                                                                                                    
8. [BUG]: Adding new Wizard which calls Post Service doesn't work

9. [BUG]: DateTime control is not correctly shown in IE11 (See Track Working Time action)

10. [Feature] Object Picker: It is not possible to search by part of the name using '%' as in previous versions. For example find initiator by his first name

11. [Feature] Automatic accept of Incident when creating it in Agent Console. Configurable in UUX Service Desk Global Settings. Disabled by default

12. [Feature] Automatic time tracking  in UUX for actions Close, Forward, Pause, Return To Role

13. [Feature] Actions can be shown in Edit Dialog. (Added attribute "Show on Edit Dialog"). Action "Take Over"  is shown by default here

14. [Feature] Actions, Widgets can be hidden to be shown in UUX. Attribute Enabled added to Action Dialog. To get changes applied - iisreset still needed

15. [Feature] Transfering calls from Incident and Person Preview when clicking on call icon placed near phone number

16. [Feature] Single attachment control added and used in Change edit dialog

17. [Feature] Adding datasource extension base on Data Definition (edited)

18. [Feature] Service method added for Changing Deadline of Ticket

19. [Feature] Now its possible to log in to MyWorkspace with non-existing in MyWorkspace Matrix42 account

Customers is using SQL 2014.

What can we check around the sequence feature?

===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1646 and must not be used with other versions!
Problems which is fixed:
- PRB29218: SQL Queries and execution plan optmisation in LCM

Installation:
=============

1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET

3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files 
  "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.LicenseManager.BizLogic.dll" 
 into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET

8. Clear browser cache (temprorary internet files)

9. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

10. Check the functionality

This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.0.1646 and must not be used with other versions! Problems which are fixed:
PRB28870 - When an multi fragment import is executed as quick import, only 1 row will be imported.

Installation:
=============
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.

2. Perform an IISRESET

3. Stop the Windows Services - "Matrix42 Engine Common" - "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" - "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Copy the files:
 "<Installationfolder>\bin\update4u.SPS.GDIE.WebUI.dll"
 "<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.SPS.GDIE.WebUI.dll"
 into a separate backup directory

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Perform an IISRESET

8. clear browser cache (temprorary internet files)

9. Start the Windows Services - "Matrix42 Engine Common" - "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" - "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

10. Check the functionality

Table1.TaskTitle: [Inquiry]: T137964 - #INC198469 - eMail-Robot does not create new incidents.
Table1.TaskDescription:
Reported By: Bönick, Matthias
Found in build: 7.2.2.1382- WPM 2014 Service Pack 2 Patch 2

Phoenix contact uses lotus notes.
The customer reports that it happens very often, that mails will be set to readed but won't be importet into service store.
It seems that this happens only to mails, which coming to notes inbox, while mailrobot is already scanning.

How can we analyze this, it is not reproducible everytime and set the mail to unread will force the mail robot to successfull import it.

The customer thinks, because notes is a document based programm, that the "document shell" for the new mail is already created but has no information inside notes, while the mail robot already retrive this empty "body" creates no ticket and set the mail to readed.

Any idea how we can analyze whats realy happens?

Table1.WiDescription:
Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.2.1712 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 
PRB29191: Silverback Data Provider is case sensitive on importing Mobile Apps
PRB29221: Silverback Enrollment over service store does not work for users which don't have any enrolled device in silverback
PRB29238 SB Import workflow starts resuming for not Correct Booking

Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
  
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Backup the files:

6. Copy the attached folders to "<Installationfolder>"

7. Execute "<Installationfolder>\Config\PRB29191_PRB29221_PRB29238_Hotfix.bat"

8. Perform an IISRESET

9. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

10. Publish Workflows (Administration->Workflows->Manage Workflows->Publish Repository)

11. Clean DataGateway Cache
    Remove Folders: 
    - <Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Host\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Workflows\Connectors.MDM_Silverback.Client
    - <Installationfolder>\DataGateway\Host\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Workflow\Workflows\ServiceCatalog.Provisioning.SilverbackEnrollementOnAgent

12. Check the functionality

- "Matrix42 Engine Common" 
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86" 
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"

10. Check the functionality

Important note:
===============
This Hotfix was created for Matrix42 Service Store 8.1.3.1876 and must not be used with other versions! 
Problems which are fixed: 

- PRB29371: Ordering a bundle fails when the service is not attached to a catalog


Installation:
=============
 
1. Log on to the Matrix42 Service Store webserver using an administrative account.
  
2. Perform an IISRESET
 
3. Stop the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"
 
4. With Windows Explorer, open the installation directory of Matrix42 Service Store
e.g. "C:\Program Files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Service Store"

5. Backup the files:

"<Installationfolder>\web\bin\update4u.Portal.UI.dll"

into a separate backup directory

6. Perform an IISRESET

7. Start the Windows Services
- "Matrix42 Engine Common"
- "Matrix42 Engine CommonX86"
- "Matrix42 Engine Scheduler"
- "Matrix42 Data Gateway"

8. Clean browser cache on client

9. Check the functionality
